MEMBER NAME  VPSB301
//VPSB301  PROC ENV=P,                                                  00000100
//         GEN1='+1',                                                   00000200
//         GEN2='+1',                                                   00000300
//         GEN3='+1',                                                   00000400
//         GEN4='+1',                                                   00000500
//         GEN5='+1',                                                   00000600
//         PRS='R',                                                     00000700
//         ALPHA='E',                                                   00000800
//         GRPACR=D900,                                                 00000900
//         BANKNM=BOA,                                                  00001000
//         JOBNAME=VPSB301A,                                            00001100
//         GRP=D966                                                     00001200
//*                                                                     00001300
//******************************************************************    00001400
//* STEP0010 -  DELETE DATASETS                                         00001500
//* STEP0020 -  ALLOCATE DATASETS                                       00001600
//* STEP0040 -  SORT BANK RECON DSN AND/OR INSERT - FOR DATE            00001700
//* STEP0050 -  BACKUP BANK FILES TO TAPE                               00001800
//* STEP0100 -  RUN VPSB301 TO UPDATE CHECK WITH CLEAR DATES            00001900
//*                                                                     00002000
//* ********* REVERSE POSITIVE PAY REPORTS **********************       00002100
//*                                                                     00002200
//* STEP0210 - DELETE CATALOGUED DATASETS LEFT OVER FROM LAST RUN       00002300
//* STEP0220 - CATALOGUE EMPTY DATASETS                                 00002400
//* STEP0230 - GET EXTRACT RECORDS FOR REVERSE POSITIVE PAY REPORTS     00002500
//* STEP0240 - SPLIT EXTRACT RECORDS FROM VPSB601                       00002600
//*                                                                     00002700
//* STEP0250 - DELETE CATALOGUED DATASETS LEFT OVER FROM LAST RUN       00002800
//* STEP0260 - CATALOGUE EMPTY DATASETS                                 00002900
//* STEP0270 - CREATE REVERSE POSITIVE PAY EXCEPTION REPORT             00003000
//*                                                                     00003100
//* STEP0280 - DELETE CATALOGUED DATASETS LEFT OVER FROM LAST RUN       00003200
//* STEP0290 - CATALOGUE EMPTY DATASETS                                 00003300
//* STEP0300 - CREATE REVERSE POSITIVE PAY CLEARED CHECK REPORT         00003400
//*                                                                     00003500
//* STEP0310 - DELETE CATALOGUED DATASETS LEFT OVER FROM LAST RUN       00003600
//* STEP0320 - CATALOGUE EMPTY DATASETS                                 00003700
//* STEP0330 - CREATE REVERSE POSITIVE PAY AMOUNT EXCEPTION REPORT      00003800
//*                                                                     00003900
//* STEP0340 - DELETE CATALOGUED DATASETS LEFT OVER FROM LAST RUN       00004000
//* STEP0350 - CATALOGUE EMPTY DATASETS                                 00004100
//* STEP0360 - CREATE REVERSE POSITIVE PAY AMOUNT EXCEPTION REPORT      00004200
//*                                                                     00004300
//* STEP0400 -  DELETE XFER DATA SET                                    00004400
//******************************************************************    00004500
//*                                                                     00004600
//************************************************                      00004700
//*  STEP0010 - DELETE DATASETS                                         00004800
//************************************************                      00004900
//STEP0010 EXEC PGM=IEFBR14                                             00005000
//DD1      DD  DSN=&GRPACR..ACRSQ.&ENV.DATA.&JOBNAME..STEP0100,         00005100
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),                                       00005200
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00005300
//             SPACE=(TRK,0)                                            00005400
//DD2      DD  DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.SORTED.CHKRECON.&BANKNM,            00005500
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),                                       00005600
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00005700
//             SPACE=(TRK,0)                                            00005800
//*                                                                     00005900
//************************************************                      00006000
//*  STEP0020 - ALLOCATE DATASETS                                       00006100
//************************************************                      00006200
//STEP0020 EXEC PGM=IEFBR14,                                            00006300
//             COND=(4,LT)                                              00006400
//DD1      DD  DSN=&GRPACR..ACRSQ.&ENV.DATA.&JOBNAME..STEP0100,         00006500
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),                                 00006600
//             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(121,(100,10)),AVGREC=U,                00006700

//             SPACE=(TRK,0)                                            00052800
MEMBER NAME  VPSB301N
//VPSB301N PROC ENV=P,                                                  00000100
//         GEN1='+1',                                                   00000200
//         GEN2='+1',                                                   00000300
//         GEN3='+1',                                                   00000400
//         GEN4='+1',                                                   00000500
//         GEN5='+1',                                                   00000600
//         PRS='R',                                                     00000700
//         GRPACR=D900,                                                 00000900
//         BANKNM=PNCBANK,                                              00001000
//         JOBNAME=VPSB301N,                                            00001100
//         GRP=D966                                                     00001200
//*                                                                     00001300
//******************************************************************    00001400
//* STEP0010 -  DELETE DATASETS                                         00001500
//* STEP0020 -  ALLOCATE DATASETS                                       00001600
//* STEP0040 -  SORT BANK RECON DSN AND/OR INSERT - FOR DATE            00001700
//* STEP0050 -  BACKUP BANK FILES TO TAPE                               00001800
//* STEP0100 -  RUN VPSB303 TO UPDATE CHECK WITH CLEAR DATES            00001900
//*                                                                     00002000
//* ********* REVERSE POSITIVE PAY REPORTS **********************       00002100
//*                                                                     00002200

//* STEP0300 - CREATE REVERSE POSITIVE PAY CLEARED CHECK REPORT         00003400

//* STEP0310 - DELETE CATALOGUED DATASETS LEFT OVER FROM LAST RUN       00003600
//* STEP0320 - CATALOGUE EMPTY DATASETS                                 00003700

//*  STEP0010 - DELETE DATASETS                                         00004800
//************************************************                      00004900
//STEP0010 EXEC PGM=IEFBR14                                             00005000
//DD1      DD  DSN=&GRPACR..ACRSQ.&ENV.DATA.&JOBNAME..STEP0100,         00005100
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),                                       00005200
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00005300
//             SPACE=(TRK,0)                                            00005400
//************************************************                      00006000
//*  STEP0020 - ALLOCATE DATASETS                                       00006100
//************************************************                      00006200
//STEP0020 EXEC PGM=IEFBR14,                                            00006300
//             COND=(4,LT)                                              00006400
//DD1      DD  DSN=&GRPACR..ACRSQ.&ENV.DATA.&JOBNAME..STEP0100,         00006500
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),                                 00006600
//             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(121,(100,10)),AVGREC=U,                00006700
//             DCB=(RECFM=FBA,LRECL=121,DSORG=PS)                       00006800
//*                                                                     00006900
//********************************************************************  00006910
//*  STEP0025 - COPY EMPTY FILE TO BANK RECON FILE                      00006920
//********************************************************************  00006930
//STEP0025 EXEC PGM=IEBGENER                                            00006995
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00006996
//SYSIN    DD  DUMMY                                                    00006997
//SYSUT1   DD  DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.INPUT.CHKRECON.EMPTY.&BANKNM,       00006998
//             DISP=SHR                                                 00006999
//SYSUT2   DD  DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.INPUT.CHKRECON.&BANKNM,             00007000
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00007001
//             SPACE=(200,(1,1),RLSE),AVGREC=K,                         00007002
//             DISP=(MOD,CATLG,DELETE),                                 00007003
//             DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=80,DSORG=PS,BLKSIZE=4800)            00007004
//*                                                                     00007005
//***************************************************************       00008700
//* STEP0040 -  BACKUP BANK FILES TO TAPE                            ** 00008800
//***************************************************************       00008900
//STEP0040 EXEC PGM=SORT,COND=(4,LT)                                    00009000
//SORTLIB  DD  DSN=SYS1.SORTLIB,DISP=SHR                                00009100
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=X,                                                00009200
//             DCB=(BLKSIZE=121,LRECL=121,RECFM=FBA)                    00009300
//SORTIN   DD  DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.INPUT.CHKRECON.&BANKNM,             00009400
//             DISP=SHR                                                 00009500
//SORTOUT  DD  DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.BACKUP.VPSBKRPP(&GEN1),             00009600
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),                                 00009700
//             UNIT=TAPE,RETPD=0300,                                    00009800
//             DCB=(GDG.MODEL,RECFM=FB,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=4800)           00009900
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SORTCOPY),                        00010000
//             DISP=SHR                                                 00010100
//*                                                                     00010200
//***************************************************************       00010300
//* STEP0100 -  PROCESS BANK RECON FILE                                 00010400
//*             READ BANK CLEARED CHECKS FILE AND USE IT TO UPDATE CLEAR00010500
//*             DATE ON VPSCKREG.                                       00010600
//*****************************************************************     00010700

MEMBER NAME  VPSB400
//* #910959 03/29/01 15:44:37    PRODUCTION 03/30/01 11:00:21

//VPSB400  PROC ENV=P,
//         GRPACR=D900,
//         GEN1='(+1)',
//         GEN6='(+1)',
//         GRP=D966
//************************************************
//* STEP0010 -  DELETE DATASETS                ***
//* STEP0020 -  ALLOCATE DATASETS              ***
//* STEP0100 -  CREATE BANK RECON RECORDS OFF  ***
//*          -  OF VPSCKREG AND VPSLCLCK         *
//* STEP0120 -  SORT BANK OF NY FILE AND STRIP   *
//*             OF DUPLICATES AND EFT PAYMENTS   *
//* STEP0121 -  SORT 1ST UNION FILE AND STRIP    *
//*             OF DUPLICATES AND EFT PAYMENTS   *
//* STEP0124 -  SORT NORTHERN TRUST FILE AND STRIP*
//*             OF DUPLICATES AND EFT PAYMENTS   *
//* STEP0130 -  LOAD BANK OF NY FILE TO          *
//*             CONNECT:DIRECT                   *
//* STEP0131 -  LOAD 1ST UNION FILE TO           *
//*             CONNECT:DIRECT                   *
//* STEP0134 -  LOAD NORTHERN TRUST FILE TO      *
//*             CONNECT:DIRECT                   *
//* STEP0200 -  AUTOCONNECT FOR BANK OF NEW YORK *
//*                                              *
//************************************************
//************************************************
//*  DELETE DATASETS
//************************************************
//STEP0010 EXEC PGM=IEFBR14
//DD1      DD  DSN=&GRPACR..ACRSQ.&ENV.DATA.VPSB400.STEP0100,
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             SPACE=(TRK,0)
//DD2      DD  DSN=&GRPACR..ACRSQ.&ENV.DATA.VPSB400.STEP0200,
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             SPACE=(TRK,0)
//*                                                                     00037000
//************************************************
//*  ALLOCATE DATASETS
//************************************************
//STEP0020 EXEC PGM=IEFBR14
//DD1      DD  DSN=&GRPACR..ACRSQ.&ENV.DATA.VPSB400.STEP0100,
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),
//             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(121,(100,10)),AVGREC=U,
//             DCB=(RECFM=FBA,LRECL=121,DSORG=PS)
//DD2      DD  DSN=&GRPACR..ACRSQ.&ENV.DATA.VPSB400.STEP0200,
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),
//             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(121,(100,10)),AVGREC=U,
//             DCB=(RECFM=FBA,LRECL=121,DSORG=PS)
//***************************************************************
//*  WRITE BANK RECON RECORDS FOR ALL CHECKS WRITTEN DURING
//*  THE PAST PERIOD.  SPLIT OUT TO INDIVIDUAL BANK FILES.
//*****************************************************************     00039900
//STEP0100 EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01                                            00040000
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00040001
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=D55.TEMP.LOAD,DISP=SHR                               00060002
//         DD  DSN=D55.PANEXEC.LOAD,DISP=SHR                            00060003
//ABNLOG   DD DSN=D999.CFMVK.&ENV.MASTER.ABND,DISP=SHR                  00070000
//ACRFILE  DD DSN=&GRPACR..ACRSQ.&ENV.DATA.VPSB400.STEP0100,DISP=SHR    00071000
//PARMFILE DD DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB2(VPSRECON),DISP=SHR                00072003
//VPSBANK1 DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.DETAIL.VPSBANK1(+1),                 00080007
//            DISP=(,CATLG,DELETE),
//            UNIT=SYSDA,                                               00080100
//            SPACE=(68,(100,10)),AVGREC=K,                             00080209
//            DCB=(GDG.MODEL,RECFM=FB,LRECL=68,DSORG=PS)                00080307
//VPSBANK2 DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.DETAIL.VPSBANK2(+1),                 00080400
//            DISP=(,CATLG,DELETE),
//            UNIT=SYSDA,                                               00080500

//            DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=28000)                     00080702
//VPSBANK5 DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.DETAIL.VPSBANK5(+1),                 00081600
//            DISP=(,CATLG,DELETE),
//            UNIT=SYSDA,                                               00081700
//            SPACE=(CYL,(10,5),RLSE),                                  00081800
//            DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=47,BLKSIZE=18800)                     00081910
//SYSABEND DD SYSOUT=*                                                  00100000
//SYSOUT   DD SYSOUT=*                                                  00120000
//SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=*                                                  00130000
//SYSTSPRT DD SYSOUT=*                                                  00140000
//*                                                                     00150000
//SYSTSIN DD DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(VPSB400&ENV),DISP=SHR               00160000
//*                                                                     00200000
//***************************************************************
//*****   REMOVE DUPLICATE RECORDS THE EFT PAYMENTS FOR  ********
//*****   THE BANK OF NEW YORK                           *******
//***************************************************************
//***************************************************************
//STEP0120 EXEC PGM=SORT
//SORTLIB  DD  DSN=SYS1.SORTLIB,DISP=SHR
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=X,
//             DCB=(BLKSIZE=121,LRECL=121,RECFM=FBA)
//SORTIN   DD  DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.DETAIL.VPSBANK1&GEN1,DISP=SHR
//SORTOUT  DD  DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.SORTED.VPSBANK1(+1),
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),
//             SPACE=(68,(2000,500),RLSE),
//             DCB=(GDG.MODEL,RECFM=FB,LRECL=68,DSORG=PS)
//SYSIN    DD DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(VPSBOFNY),DISP=SHR
//***************************************************************
//*****   REMOVE DUPLICATE RECORDS AND EFT PAYMENTS**************
//*****   FOR 1ST UNION BANK                       **************
//***************************************************************
//***************************************************************
//STEP0121 EXEC PGM=SORT
//SORTLIB  DD  DSN=SYS1.SORTLIB,DISP=SHR
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=X,
//             DCB=(BLKSIZE=121,LRECL=121,RECFM=FBA)
//SORTIN   DD  DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.DETAIL.VPSBANK2&GEN1,DISP=SHR
//SORTOUT  DD  DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.SORTED.VPSBANK2(+1),
//            DISP=(,CATLG,DELETE),
//            UNIT=SYSDA,
//            SPACE=(80,(5000,500),RLSE),
//            DCB=(GDG.MODEL,RECFM=FB,LRECL=80,DSORG=PS)
//SYSIN    DD DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(VPS1STUN),DISP=SHR
//***************************************************************
//*****   COPY CURRENT BUYFIL TO OLD FILE       *****************
//***************************************************************
//***************************************************************
//STEP0124 EXEC PGM=SORT
//SORTLIB  DD  DSN=SYS1.SORTLIB,DISP=SHR
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=X,
//             DCB=(BLKSIZE=121,LRECL=121,RECFM=FBA)
//SORTIN   DD  DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.DETAIL.VPSBANK5&GEN1,DISP=SHR
//SORTOUT  DD  DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.SORTED.VPSBANK5(+1),
//            DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),
//            UNIT=SYSDA,
//            SPACE=(CYL,(10,5),RLSE),
//            DCB=(GDG.MODEL,RECFM=FB,LRECL=40,DSORG=PS)

//***************************************************************
//*****   DUMP BANK OF NY FILE TO CONNECT:MAILBOX  ** ***********
//***************************************************************

//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*
//STEPLIB  DD    DSN=D955.MAILBOX.LOAD,DISP=SHR
//SYSTERM  DD   SYSOUT=*

//OUTFILE  DD DUMMY
//INFILE   DD DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(VPSADDNY),DISP=SHR
//         DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.SORTED.VPSBANK1&GEN6,

//            DISP=SHR

//STEPLIB  DD DSN=SYS1.OLDLINK,DISP=SHR
MEMBER NAME  VPSB410
//* #910959 02/01/01 09:09:21    PRODUCTION 02/01/01 11:00:24
//* #910959 01/02/01 11:32:37    PRODUCTION 01/03/01 11:05:34
//* #910959 12/05/00 10:59:49    PRODUCTION 12/05/00 16:30:06
//* #910959 11/09/00 10:01:58    PRODUCTION 11/09/00 16:30:03
//* #910959 11/03/00 08:11:35    PRODUCTION 11/03/00 11:00:39
//* #910995 09/21/00 13:32:31    PRODUCTION 09/21/00 16:30:06
//* #910959 09/12/00 16:19:51    PRODUCTION 09/13/00 16:30:31
//* #910995 09/06/00 13:36:46    PRODUCTION 09/07/00 11:00:14
//VPSB400  PROC ENV=P,
//         GRPACR=D900,
//         GEN1='(+1)',
//         GEN2='(+1)',
//         GEN3='(+1)',
//         GEN4='(+1)',
//         GEN6='(+1)',
//         GEN7='(+1)',
//         GEN8='(+1)',
//         GRP=D966
//************************************************
//* STEP0010 -  DELETE LAST RUNS FILES           *
//*                                              *
//* STEP0100 -  PULL IN BANK OF NY FILE          *
//*          -  OF CLEARED CHECKS
//* STEP0101 -  PULL IN 1ST UNION FILE           *
//*          -  OF CLEARED CHECKS
//* STEP0101B-  ADD '-' TO 1ST UNION FILE        *
//* STEP0102 -  PULL IN PNC FILE                 *
//*          -  OF CLEARED CHECKS
//* STEP0102B-  ADD '-' TO PNC FILE              *
//* STEP0103 -  PULL IN 1ST CHICAGE FILE         *
//*          -  OF CLEARED CHECKS
//* STEP0103B-  ADD '-' TO BANK1 FILE            *
//* STEP0104 -  PULL IN NORTHERN TRUST FILE      *
//*          -  OF CLEARED CHECKS
//* STEP0120 -  READ BANK CHECK CLEARED RECORDS  *
//*          -  AND UPDATE CHECK CLEARED DATES   *
//*          -  ON VPSCKREG AND VPSLCLCK.  IF    *
//*          -  CHECK NOT FOUND WRITE OUT TO     *
//*          -  FLAT FILE TO BE RUN IN AFTER THE *
//*          -  CONVERSION.
//************************************************
//************************************************
//*  DELETE DATASETS
//************************************************

//DD1      DD  DSN=&GRPACR..ACRSQ.&ENV.DATA.VPSB400.STEP0200,

//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=D55.TEMP.LOAD,DISP=SHR                               00060002

//         DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.SORTED.VPSBANK2&GEN1,DISP=SHR

MEMBER NAME  VPSB800
//VPSB800  PROC ENV=P,                                                  00010000
//         GRP='D966',                                                  00020000
//         ALPHA='E',                                                   00030003
//         BANKNM='BOA'                                                 00040001
//*                                                                     00050000
//******************************************************************    00060000
//*  STEP0005 - DELETE BANK RECON FILE                                  00070000
//*  STEP0010 - RECEIVE BANK DATA FROM THE FTP SERVER                   00080000
//******************************************************************    00090000
//*                                                                     00100000
//******************************************************************    00110000
//* STEP0005 -  DELETE BANK RECON FILE                                  00120000
//******************************************************************    00130000
//STEP0005 EXEC PGM=IEFBR14                                             00140002
//DD1      DD  DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.INPUT.CHKRECON.&BANKNM,             00150000
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00160000
//             SPACE=(80,(1,1),RLSE),AVGREC=K,                          00170000
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),                                       00180000
//             DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=80,DSORG=PS)                         00190000
//*                                                                     00200000
//DD2      DD  DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.INPUT.CHKRECON.EMPTY.&BANKNM,       00200100
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00200200
//             SPACE=(80,(1,1),RLSE),AVGREC=K,                          00200300
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),                                       00200400
//             DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=80,DSORG=PS,BLKSIZE=0)               00200500
//*                                                                     00200600
//******************************************************************    00200700
//*              17-JAN-2007 CHANGES START #910092                 *    00200800
//*             STEP0007 - CREATE EMPTY FILE FOR STEP0010          *    00200900
//******************************************************************    00201000
//STEP0007 EXEC PGM=IEBGENER,                                           00201100
//            COND=(4,LE)                                               00201200
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00201300
//SYSIN    DD  DUMMY                                                    00201400
//SYSUT1   DD  DUMMY,                                                   00201500

//********************************************************************  11340000
//*  USBSPLIT- SPLIT THE FILE INTO ISSUED AND VOIDED                 *  11350000
//********************************************************************  11360000
//USBSPLIT EXEC PGM=SORT
//SORTIN   DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.DTLUSB.VPSCKREG.PRNTEMP,DISP=SHR
//SORTOF01 DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.DTLUSB.VPSCKREG.ISSUE,
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             SPACE=(CYL,(50,50,),RLSE),

//*
//********************************************************************  11340000
//*  USBCOMP- COMPARE THE VOIDED CHECKS WITH REVOLVING FILE          *  11350000
//********************************************************************  11360000
//USBCOMP EXEC PGM=SORT
//SORTJNF1 DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.DTLUSB.VPSCKREG.VOID,DISP=SHR
//SORTJNF2 DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.DTLUSB.VPSCKREG(0),DISP=SHR

//********************************************************************  11340000

//********************************************************************  11360000
//USBTRAIL EXEC PGM=SORT
//SORTIN   DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.DTLUSB.VPSCKREG.ISSUE,DISP=SHR

//SORTIN   DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.DTLUSB.VPSCKREG.PRN,DISP=SHR

//**********************************************************************02010000
//STEP0035 EXEC PGM=IEFBR14,                                            02020000
//            COND=(4,LT)                                               02030000
//DD1      DD  DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.DTL060.VPSCKREG,                    02040000

//             SPACE=(TRK,0)                                            02070000
//*                                                                     02080000
//***************************************************************       02090000
//*STEP0040 EXTRACTS RECORDS FOR 060 FROM CHECK REGISTER FILE ****      02100000
//***************************************************************       02110000
//STEP0040 EXEC PGM=SORT,COND=(4,LT)                                    02120000
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=&SOUT                                             02130000

//             DISP=(,CATLG,KEEP),                                      02180000

//             DISP=(,CATLG,KEEP),                                      05550000
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              05560000
//             SPACE=(425,(200,20),RLSE),AVGREC=K,                      05570000
//             DCB=(GDG.MODEL,RECFM=FB,LRECL=425,DSORG=PS)              05580000
//SORTOFA7 DD  DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.DTLPRG.VPSCKREG,                    02170000
//             DISP=(,CATLG,KEEP),                                      02180000
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              02190000
//             SPACE=(425,(200,20),RLSE),AVGREC=K,                      02200000
//             DCB=(GDG.MODEL,RECFM=FB,LRECL=425,DSORG=PS)              02210000
//**********************************************************************02220000
//*   STEP0045 CREATE VPSCKREG DATASET FOR DIVISION 250                 02230000
//**********************************************************************02240000
//*STEP0045 EXEC PGM=IEFBR14,                                           02250000

MEMBER NAME  VPSPE14
//VPSPE14  PROC ENV=P,                                                  00010000
//         YEAR='2004'                                                  00020001
//* ------------------------------------------------------------------- 00030002
//*  THE LOCAL CHECK AND CHECK/ INVOICE BACKAPS ARE BACKING UP          00040001
//*  PURGING YEAR.  IN DEC. YEAR END 2005, 2004 WILL BE PURGED SO       00050001
//*  THE YEAR PARM WILL BE 2004.                                        00060005
//*                                                                     00060105
//* ------------------------------------------------------------------- 00080002
//*                                                                     00090002
//* ********************************************************************00100000
//*  STEP0010 - DELETE LOCAL CHECK DATASETS                             00120001
//*  STEP0020 - UNLOAD PRODUCTION (DB2P) VPSLCLCK TABLE DATA            00130000
//*  STEP0025 - DELETE LOCAL CHECK RELOAD DSN                           00140001
//*  STEP0030 - SELECT PRIOR YEARS LCP CHECKS THAT ARE NOT RECONCILED   00150000
//*                                                                     00160001
//*  STEP0040 - DELETE CHECK REGISTER DATASETS                          00170000
//*  STEP0050 - UNLOAD PRODUCTION (DB2P) VPSCKREG TABLE DATA            00180000
//*  STEP0055 - DELETE LOCAL CHECK RELOAD DSN                           00190001
//*  STEP0060 - SELECT PRIOR YEARS CHECKS THAT ARE NOT RECONCILED       00200000
//*                                                                     00210001
//*  STEP0070 - DELETE INVOICE REGISTER DATASETS                        00220000
//*  STEP0080 - UNLOAD VPSIVREG DATA                                    00230000
//*  STEP0090 - SORT INVOICE REGISTER FILE                              00240000
//*  STEP0100 - DELETE OUTPUT DATASETS OF VPSU200                       00250000
//*  STEP0110 - CATALOGUE IVREG RELOAD DATA SET                         00260000
//*  STEP0120 - CATALOGUE VPSU200 DATA SET                              00270000
//*  STEP0130 - RUN PROGRAM VPSU200 CREATING PROIR YEARS INVOICE FILE   00280000
//* ********************************************************************00290000
//*                                                                     00300000
//* ------------------------------------------------------------------  00310000

MEMBER NAME  VPSP950F
//VPSP950F PROC TRMUTL='VPSPTML'
//********************************************************************* 00000040
//*   THIS PROC CREATES BOTH LOCAL AND DISASTER RECOVERY IMAGE       ** 00000050
//*   COPIES FOR THE VPS TS.                                         ** 00000050
//*                                                                  ** 00000060
//*              STEP DESCRIPTIONS                                   ** 00000070
//*              --------------------------------------------------  ** 00000080
//*   STEP0010 - START VPS DATABASE READ ONLY                        ** 00000090
//*   STEP0020 - QUIESCE ALL VPS TABLE SPACES                        ** 00000140
//*   STEP0030 - IMAGE COPY OF ALL VPS TS EXCEPT VPS015TS (VPSIVREG) ** 00000140
//*   STEP0040 - TERMINATE THE IMAGE COPY UTILITY ON FAILURE         **
//*   STEP0050 - IMAGE COPY VPS015TS  BY PART (VPSIVREG)             **
//*   STEP0060 - START DATA BASES READ/WRITE                         ** 00000140
//*                                                                  ** 00000100
//*   DATE   INIT  PROC CHANGES                                      ** 00000110
//* -------- ----  ----------------------------------------------    ** 00000120
//* 09/20/00 BSM   PROC CREATED FOR PROD' VPSDB                      ** 00000130
//* 08/05/04 BSM   ADDED VPS028TS AND VPS029TS                       ** 00000130
//* 07/21/05 BSM   ADDED VPS027TS AND VPS030TS                       ** 00000130
//* 03/11/08 ND    CHANGED VPS015TS (VPSIVREG) TO IC BY PART         ** 00000130
//* 06/05/09 ND    REMOVED DRCOPIES & MODIFIED TO USE TEMPLATE       ** 00000130
//*                                                                  ** 00000140
//********************************************************************* 00000150
//*   STEP0010 - START DATA BASES READ ONLY                          ** 00000140
//********************************************************************* 00000150
//STEP0010 EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSTSPRT DD SYSOUT=*
//SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=*
//SYSTSIN  DD DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(VPSPSRO),DISP=SHR
//*
//********************************************************************* 00000150
//*   STEP0020 - QUIESCE ALL TABLE SPACES                            ** 00000140
//********************************************************************* 00000150
//STEP0020 EXEC PGM=DSNUTILB,
//             COND=(4,LT),
//             PARM='DB2P'
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*
//UTPRINT  DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSIN    DD DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(VPSPQUI),DISP=SHR
//*
//********************************************************************* 00000150
//*   STEP0030 - IMAGE COPY OF ALL VPS TS EXCEPT VPS015TS (VPSIVREG) ** 00000140
//********************************************************************* 00000150
//STEP0030 EXEC PGM=DSNUTILB,                                           00000120
//             COND=(4,LT),
//             PARM='DB2P'                                              00000130
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00000131
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=DB2P.DB2.DSNLOAD,DISP=SHR
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00000180
//UTPRINT  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00000190
//SYSUDUMP DD  SYSOUT=Y
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSIN    DD DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(VPSPFIC),DISP=SHR
//*********************************************************************
//*   STEP0040 - TERMINATE THE IMAGE COPY UTILITY ON FAILURE         **
//*********************************************************************
//STEP0040 EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01,
//             DYNAMNBR=20,
//             COND=ONLY
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSTSPRT DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSTSIN  DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(&TRMUTL),
//             DISP=SHR
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*
//*
//********************************************************************* 00000210
//*   STEP0050 - IMAGE COPY VPSIVREG  - VPS015TS                     ** 00000220
//********************************************************************* 00000230
//STEP0050 EXEC PGM=DSNUTILB,                                           00000240
//         PARM='DB2P,,',                                               00000250
//         COND=(5,LE,STEP0030)
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00000251
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=DB2P.DB2.DSNLOAD,                                    00000260
//             DISP=SHR                                                 00000270
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00000280
//UTPRINT  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00000290
//SYSOUT   DD SYSOUT=*
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(VPSPFIC1),                        00000310
//             DISP=SHR                                                 00000320

//********************************************************************* 00000150

//*             VPS INPUT GDG FILE AND IPAYABLES BACKUP GDG             02290000
//*************************************************************         02300000
//*STEP0025 EXEC PGM=SORT,                                              02310000
//*             PARM='FLAG(I),BMSG',                                    02320000
//*             COND=(4,LE)                                             02330000
//*SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*                                                02340000
//*SORTIN   DD  DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.INPUT.IPAYABLE,                    02350000
//*             DISP=SHR                                                02360000
//*SORTOF1  DD  DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.BACKUP.IPAYABLE(+1),               02370000
//*             UNIT=SYSDA,                                             02380000
//*             DISP=(,CATLG,DELETE),                                   02390000
//*             SPACE=(CYL,(1,1),RLSE),                                 02400000
//*             DCB=(GDG.MODEL,LRECL=400,RECFM=FB,DSORG=PS)             02410000
//*SORTOF2  DD  DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.INPUT.VPSI0001(+1),                02420000
//*             UNIT=SYSDA,                                             02430000
//*             DISP=(,CATLG,DELETE),                                   02440000
//*             SPACE=(CYL,(1,1),RLSE),                                 02450000
//*             DCB=(GDG.MODEL,LRECL=400,RECFM=FB,DSORG=PS)             02460000
//*SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SORTCPY2),                       02470000
//*             DISP=SHR                                                02480000
//**************************************************************        02490000
//*  STEP0035 - DELETE ALL GENERATIONS OF IPAYABLES DATA FILE           02500000
//*************************************************************         02510000
//*STEP0035 EXEC PGM=IEFBR14,                                           02520000
//*            COND=(4,LE)                                              02530000
//*DD1      DD  DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.INPUT.IPAYABLE,                    02540000
//*             UNIT=SYSDA,                                             02550000
//*             DISP=(OLD,DELETE,KEEP),                                 02560000
//*             SPACE=(400,(20,2),RLSE),AVGREC=K,                       02570000
//*             DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=400,DSORG=PS)                       02580000
//**********************************************************************02590000
//* STEP0045 - CREATE EMPTY GENERATION OF IPAYABLES INPUT GDG           02600000
//**********************************************************************02610000
//*STEP0045 EXEC PGM=SORT,                                              02620000
//*             COND=(4,LE)                                             02630000
//*SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*                                                02640000
//*SORTIN   DD  DUMMY,                                                  02650000
//*             DCB=(GDG.MODEL,LRECL=400,RECFM=FB,DSORG=PS)             02660000
//*SORTOUT  DD  DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.INPUT.IPAYABLE(+1),                02670000
//*             UNIT=SYSDA,                                             02680000
//*             DISP=(,CATLG,DELETE),                                   02690000
//*             SPACE=(CYL,(4,1),RLSE),                                 02700000
//*             DCB=(GDG.MODEL,LRECL=400,RECFM=FB,DSORG=PS)             02710000
//*SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SORTCOPY),                       02720000
//*             DISP=SHR                                                02730000
//**********************************************************************02740000
//*  SPECIAL PROCEDURE TO DELETE IOS ROWS FROM VPSEVLOG (STEP0050-0070) 02750000
//**********************************************************************02760000
//* STEP0050 - UNLOAD VPSEVLOG DATA                                     02770000
//**********************************************************************02780000
//STEP0050 EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01,                                           02790000
//         DYNAMNBR=20,COND=(4,LE)                                      02800000
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 02800001
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=DB2P.DB2.DSNEXIT,                                    02810000
//             DISP=SHR                                                 02820000
//         DD  DSN=DB2P.DB2.DSNLOAD,                                    02830000

//SYSTSIN  DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SQLTIAUP),                        02880000
//             DISP=SHR                                                 02890000
//SYSREC00 DD  DSN=D966.VPSSQ.&ENV.BACKUP.D061.VPSEVLOG(&GEN2A),        02910000
//             UNIT=TAPE,                                               02920000
//             RETPD=0150,                                              02930000
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),                                 02940000
//             DCB=(GDG.MODEL,RECFM=FB,LRECL=210,BLKSIZE=27930)         02950000
//SYSPUNCH DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 02960000
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(VPS200PA),DISP=SHR                02970000
//*                                                                     02980000
//********************************************************************  02990000
//* STEP0060 - UNLOAD VPSEXLOG DATA                                  *  03000000
//********************************************************************  03010000
//STEP0060 EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01,                                           03020000
//         DYNAMNBR=20,COND=(4,LE)                                      03030000
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 03030001
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=DB2P.DB2.DSNEXIT,                                    03040000
//             DISP=SHR                                                 03050000

//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(VPS200PB),DISP=SHR                03200000
//*                                                                     03210000
//********************************************************************  03220000
//* STEP0070 - DELETE 061 PRIOR DAY EVENTS                           *  03230000
//********************************************************************  03240000
//STEP0070 EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01,COND=(4,LE)                                03250000
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 03250001
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=D55.TEMP.LOAD,DISP=SHR                               03270002
//         DD  DSN=D55.PANEXEC.LOAD,DISP=SHR                            03270003

//            DISP=SHR                                                  03350000
//*                                                                     03360000
//*******************************************************
//*  STEP0075 - SORT
//*******************************************************
//STEP0075 EXEC PGM=SORT,COND=(4,LT)
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*
//SORTIN   DD  DSN=D966.FINSQ.PDUMMY.INVOICE.FILE,
//             DISP=SHR
//SORTOUT  DD  DSN=D966.VPSSQ.PINPUT.CAROLINA.VPSI0001,
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             DISP=(MOD,CATLG,DELETE),
//             SPACE=(CYL,(1,1),RLSE),
//             DCB=(LRECL=400,RECFM=FB,DSORG=PS)
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SORTCOPY),
//             DISP=SHR
//*
//*******************************************************
//*  STEP0080 - SORT - EXTRACT CAROLINA COUPONS FILE
//*******************************************************
//STEP0080 EXEC PGM=SORT
//SORTIN   DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.INPUT.CAROLINA.VPSI0001,
//            DISP=(OLD,DELETE,KEEP)
//SORTOUT  DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.INPUT.VPSI0001(+1),
//            UNIT=SYSDA,
//            DISP=(,CATLG,DELETE),
//            SPACE=(CYL,(1,1),RLSE),
//            DCB=(GDG.MODEL,LRECL=400,RECFM=FB,DSORG=PS)
//SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=*
//SYSOUT   DD SYSOUT=*
//SYSIN    DD DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(VPSCARLN),DISP=SHR
//*
//*--------------------------------------------------------------------*
//* STEP0081 -  DELETE RIVERMINE DATASETS FROM PREVIOUS RUN            *
//*--------------------------------------------------------------------*
//STEP0081 EXEC PGM=IEFBR14,
//            COND=(4,LE)
//DD1      DD  DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.OUTPUT.PCARD.VPSRVRM.CSV,
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE,DELETE),
//             SPACE=(CYL,(1,1),RLSE)
//DD2      DD  DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.OUTPUT.BORA.VPSRVRM.CSV,
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE,DELETE),
//             SPACE=(CYL,(1,1),RLSE)
//DD3      DD  DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.INPUT.PCARD.VPSRVRM,
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE,DELETE),
//             SPACE=(CYL,(1,1),RLSE)
//DD4      DD  DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.INPUT.BORA.VPSRVRM,
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE,DELETE),
//             SPACE=(CYL,(1,1),RLSE)
//*                                                                     10520017
//*--------------------------------------------------------------------*
//*  STEP0082 - SORT - SEPERATE PCARD DATA FROM RIVERMINE FILE.        *
//*--------------------------------------------------------------------*
//STEP0082 EXEC PGM=SORT,COND=(4,LE)                                    00050005
//SORTLIB  DD DSN=SYS1.SORTLIB,
//            DISP=SHR
//SYSOUT   DD SYSOUT=*                                                  00060005
//SYSIN    DD DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(VPSRVRM1),DISP=SHR                 00070006
//*                                                                     00079106
//SORTIN   DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.INPUT.RVRMINE.VPSI0001,              00080005
//            DISP=OLD                                                  00090005
//SORTOF01 DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.INPUT.VPSI0001(+2),                  00100005
//            UNIT=SYSDA,                                               00110005
//            DISP=(,CATLG,DELETE),                                     00120005
//            SPACE=(CYL,(1,1),RLSE),                                   00130005
//            DCB=(GDG.MODEL,RECFM=FB,LRECL=400,BLKSIZE=27600,DSORG=PS) 00140005
//SORTOF02 DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.INPUT.PCARD.VPSRVRM,                 00100005
//            UNIT=SYSDA,                                               00110005
//            SPACE=(CYL,(5,5),RLSE),                                   00120005
//            DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),                                  00130005
//            DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=400,BLKSIZE=27600,DSORG=PS)           00140005
//SORTOF03 DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.INPUT.BORA.VPSRVRM,                  00100005
//            UNIT=SYSDA,                                               00110005
//            SPACE=(CYL,(5,5),RLSE),                                   00120005
//            DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),                                  00130005
//            DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=400,BLKSIZE=27600,DSORG=PS)           00140005
//*--------------------------------------------------------------------*
//*   BACKUP ALL GEN'S OF THE RIVERMINE INFEED DATA.                   *
//*--------------------------------------------------------------------*
//STEP0083 EXEC PGM=IEBGENER,
//             COND=(4,LE)
//SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=*
//SYSOUT   DD SYSOUT=*
//SYSIN    DD DUMMY
//***-----RIVERMINE INPUT RECORDS -----------------------------------***
//SYSUT1   DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.INPUT.RVRMINE.VPSI0001,
//            DISP=(OLD,DELETE,KEEP)
//***-----RIVERMINE INPUT RECORDS BACKUP ----------------------------***
//SYSUT2   DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.BACKUP.RVRMINE.VPSI0001(+1),
//            UNIT=SYSDA,
//            DISP=(,CATLG,DELETE),
//            SPACE=(CYL,(2,2),RLSE),
//            DCB=(GDG.MODEL,RECFM=FB,LRECL=400,BLKSIZE=27600,DSORG=PS)
//*--------------------------------------------------------------------*
//*     CREATE EMPTY GDG OF RIVERMINE INPUT TO THIS PROC               *
//*--------------------------------------------------------------------*
//STEP0084 EXEC PGM=IEBGENER,
//             COND=(4,LE)
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSIN    DD  DUMMY
//***-----RIVERMINE INPUT RECORDS -----------------------------------***
//SYSUT2   DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.INPUT.RVRMINE.VPSI0001(+1),
//            UNIT=SYSDA,
//            DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),
//            SPACE=(CYL,(1,1),RLSE),
//            DCB=(GDG.MODEL,RECFM=FB,LRECL=400,BLKSIZE=27600,DSORG=PS)
//SYSUT1   DD DUMMY,
//            DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=400,BLKSIZE=27600,DSORG=PS)
//*
//*--------------------------------------------------------------------*
//*  STEP0085 - SORT - PROCESS PCARD DATA TO CSV FORMAT.               *
//*--------------------------------------------------------------------*
//STEP0085 EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01,COND=(4,LE)
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=D55.TEMP.LOAD,DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D55.PANEXEC.LOAD,DISP=SHR
//ABNLOG   DD DSN=D999.CFMVK.PMASTER.ABND,DISP=SHR
//VPSINPUT DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.INPUT.PCARD.VPSRVRM,DISP=OLD
//SYSABEND DD SYSOUT=*
//SYSUDUMP DD SYSOUT=*
//EXTRACT  DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.OUTPUT.PCARD.VPSRVRM.CSV,
//            UNIT=SYSDA,
//            DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),
//            SPACE=(CYL,(1,1),RLSE),
//            DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=400,BLKSIZE=27600,DSORG=PS)
//SYSOUT   DD SYSOUT=*
//SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=*
//SYSTSPRT DD SYSOUT=*
//SYSTSIN  DD DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(VPSRVRM&ENV),DISP=SHR
//*
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00020000
//* DATE2CD  - ADD MONTH AND DAY TO C:D  FILE  -- C046098               00090000
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00100000
//DATE2CD  EXEC PGM=VPSMSSGR                                            00110004
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=D55.TEMP.LOAD,DISP=SHR                               00120008
//         DD  DSN=D55.PANEXEC.LOAD,DISP=SHR                            00120009
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00130000
//MSSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(VPSRVRM2),DISP=SHR                00160004
//MSSOUT   DD  DSN=D966.VPSSQ.PDETAIL.VPSMSSGR,DISP=SHR                 00170004
//*--------------------------------------------------------------------*00180004
//*--------------------------------------------------------------------*
//* STEP0086 - C:D TO PROD RIVERMINE NODE                              *10360017
//*--------------------------------------------------------------------*
//STEP0086  EXEC PGM=DMBATCH,                                           10380017
//          REGION=1024K,                                               10390017
//          PARM=(YYSLYNN),COND=(4,LE)                                  10400017
//STEPLIB   DD DSN=SYS1.CD.LINKLIB,                                     10410017
//          DISP=SHR                                                    10420017
//DMNETMAP  DD DSN=D955.NDM51.NETMAP,                                   10430017
//          DISP=SHR                                                    10440017
//DMPUBLIB  DD DSN=D955.NDM.PROCESS.LIB,                                10450017
//          DISP=SHR                                                    10460017
//DMMSGFIL  DD DSN=D955.NDM.MSG,                                        10470017

//          DISP=SHR                                                    10520017
//*                                                                     10520017
//******************************************************************    03370000
//*  STEP0100 - COPY INPUT 031 AND 041 FILES TO BACKUP                  03380000
//******************************************************************    03390000

//******************************************************************    04420000
//STEP0170 EXEC PGM=SORT,                                               04430000
//            COND=(4,LE)                                               04440000
//SORTLIB  DD DSN=SYS1.SORTLIB,                                         04450000
//            DISP=SHR                                                  04460000

//*--- INCLUDE 040 AND 041 AND DIVISION 025 AND 060 ----------------*** 04520000

//            UNIT=TAPE,RETPD=2,                                        04540000
//            DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),                                  04550000
//            DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=400,DSORG=PS)                         04560000

//SORTOFA2 DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.OMIT.VPSPAYBL,                       04580000
//            DISP=OLD                                                  04590000
//******************************************************************    04600000
//*  STEP0180 - PROCESS 041 RECORDS: PAYABLE UPDATE                     04610000
//******************************************************************    04620000
//STEP0180 EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01,                                           04630000
//            COND=(4,LE)                                               04640000
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 04640001
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=D55.TEMP.LOAD,DISP=SHR                               04660002
//         DD  DSN=D55.PANEXEC.LOAD,DISP=SHR                            04660003

//STEPI180 EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01,DYNAMNBR=20,COND=(4,LT)                    03760015
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 03760016
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=D55.TEMP.LOAD,DISP=SHR                               03770017
//         DD  DSN=D55.PANEXEC.LOAD,DISP=SHR                            03770018
//ABNLOG   DD DSN=&ABNLOG.,                                             03790015
//            DISP=SHR                                                  03800015
//VPSPARM  DD DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(VPSR400&PRS.),                     03810015
//            DISP=SHR                                                  03820015
//VPSLIAB  DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.INPUT.VPSR401,                       03830015
//            DISP=SHR                                                  03840015
//VPSVDTL  DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.OUTPUT.VPSR401,                      03850015
//            DISP=OLD,                                                 03860015
//            DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=50,DSORG=PS)                          03870015
//SYSTSIN  DD DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(VPSR401&ENV.),                     03880015
//            DISP=SHR                                                  03890015
//SYSTSPRT DD SYSOUT=*                                                  03900015
//SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=*                                                  03910015
//SYSOUT   DD SYSOUT=*                                                  03930015
//*                                                                     03940015
//********************************************************************  03730015
//* STEPJ180 - EXECUTE VPSR403                                       *  03740015
//********************************************************************  03750015
//STEPJ180 EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01,DYNAMNBR=20,COND=(4,LT)                    03760015
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 03760016
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=D55.TEMP.LOAD,DISP=SHR                               03770017
//         DD  DSN=D55.PANEXEC.LOAD,DISP=SHR                            03770018
//ABNLOG   DD DSN=&ABNLOG.,                                             03790015
//            DISP=SHR                                                  03800015
//VPSREAD  DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.OUTPUT.VPSR401,                      03830015
//            DISP=SHR                                                  03840015
//VPSVDTL  DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.OUTPUT.VPSR403,                      03850015
//            DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),                                  03860015
//            UNIT=SYSDA,
//            SPACE=(CYL,(10,10)),
//            DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=50,DSORG=PS)                          03870015
//SYSTSIN  DD DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(VPSR403&ENV.),                     03880015
//            DISP=SHR                                                  03890015
//SYSTSPRT DD SYSOUT=*                                                  03900015
//SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=*                                                  03910015
//SYSOUT   DD SYSOUT=*                                                  03930015
//*                                                                     03940015
//********************************************************************  03950015
//* STEPI190 - DELETE SORT OUTPUT DATASET                            *  03960015
//********************************************************************  03970015
//STEPI190 EXEC PGM=IEFBR14,COND=(4,LT)                                 03980015
//DELFAC16 DD  DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.SORTED.VPSR401,                     03990015
//         DISP=(MOD,DELETE,DELETE)                                     04010015
//*                                                                     04020015
//********************************************************************  04030015
//* STEPI200 - SORT STEP TO PREPARE INPUT TO VPSR402                 *  04040015
//********************************************************************  04050015
//STEPI200 EXEC PGM=SORT,COND=(4,LT)                                    04060015
//SORTLIB  DD  DSN=SYS1.SORTLIB,                                        04070015
//             DISP=SHR                                                 04080015
//SORTIN   DD  DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.OUTPUT.VPSR403,                     04090015
//             DISP=SHR                                                 04100015
//SORTOUT  DD  DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.SORTED.VPSR401,                     04110015
//             UNIT=TAPE,                                               04120015
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),                                 04130015
//             DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=50,DSORG=PS)                         04140015
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(VPSR402F),DISP=SHR                04150015
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 04160015
//*                                                                     04170015
//********************************************************************  04180015
//* STEPI210 - DELETE OUTPUT DATASETS OF VPSR402                     *  04190015
//********************************************************************  04200015
//STEPI210 EXEC PGM=IEFBR14,COND=(4,LT)                                 04210015
//ACRFILE  DD DSN=&GRPACR..ACRSQ.&ENV.DATA.&JOBNAME..STEPI230,          04220015
//            DISP=(MOD,DELETE,DELETE),                                 04230015
//            UNIT=SYSDA,                                               04240015
//            SPACE=(TRK,0)                                             04250015
//DD2      DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.DTLVPS.ARRECAP,                      04260015
//            DISP=(MOD,DELETE,DELETE),                                 04270015
//            UNIT=SYSDA,                                               04280015
//            SPACE=(TRK,0)                                             04290015

//            UNIT=SYSDA,                                               04320015
//            SPACE=(TRK,0)                                             04330015
//********************************************************************  04340015

//ACRFILE  DD DSN=&GRPACR..ACRSQ.&ENV.DATA.&JOBNAME..STEPI230,          04380015

//ACRFILE  DD DSN=&GRPACR..ACRSQ.&ENV.DATA.&JOBNAME..STEP0180,          07160000

//**********************************************************************07230000
//STEP0170 EXEC PGM=SORT,                                               07240000
//            COND=(4,LT)                                               07250000
//SORTIN  DD   DUMMY,                                                   07260000
//             DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=300,BLKSIZE=23400)                   07270000

//***********************************************************           00043900

//***********************************************************           00044100
//STEP0110 EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01,COND=(4,LT)                                00044200
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00044300
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=D55.TEMP.LOAD,DISP=SHR                               00044400

MEMBER NAME  VPSV301
//VPSV301  PROC ENV=P                                                   00000100
//*******************************************************************   00000200
//* STEP0010 -  VENDOR ADD/UPDATE RECORD BATCH CREATION                 00000300
//*******************************************************************   00000400

//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00000600
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=D55.TEMP.LOAD,DISP=SHR                               00000700
//         DD  DSN=D55.PANEXEC.LOAD,DISP=SHR                            00000800

MEMBER NAME  VPSV305
//* #910959 10/30/03 12:45:12    PRODUCTION 10/31/03 11:00:02
//* #910995 11/27/02 11:35:54    PRODUCTION 11/27/02 16:31:02
//* #910995 07/03/02 09:11:39    PRODUCTION 07/03/02 11:00:07
//* #910959 10/25/01 12:31:25    PRODUCTION 10/25/01 16:30:03
//* #910959 02/05/01 16:08:57    PRODUCTION 02/12/01 11:00:04
//* #910959 01/30/01 13:20:38    PRODUCTION 02/01/01 11:00:24
//VPSV305  PROC ENV=P,
//         GRPACR=D900,
//         JOBNAME=VPSV305,                                             00110011
//         GENE1='+1',                                                  00070026
//         GRP=D966
//************************************************
//* STEP0010 -  DELETE OLD FILES               ***
//* STEP0100 -  VENDOR BOOK RECORD CREATE      ***
//* STEP0200 -  SORT DIVISION 060 VENDOR BOOK  ***
//* STEP0300 -  SORT DIVISION 250 VENDOR BOOK  ***
//* *********   VENDOR BOOKS REEPORT ****************************       00550010
//* STEP0600 - DELETE CATALOGUED DATASETS LEFT OVER FROM LAST RUN       00560016
//* STEP0610 - CATALOGUE EMPTY DATASETS                                 00570016
//* STEP0620 - VENDOR BOOKS REPORT                                      00580016
//* STEP0630 - DELETE CATALOGUED DATASETS LEFT OVER FROM LAST RUN       00590016
//* STEP0640 - CATALOGUE EMPTY DATASETS                                 00600016
//* STEP0650 - CREATE THE VENDOR BOOKS REPORT                           00610016
//************************************************
//************************************************
//*  DELETE DATASETS
//************************************************
//STEP0010 EXEC PGM=IEFBR14
//DD1      DD  DSN=&GRPACR..ACRSQ.&ENV.DATA.VPSV300.STEP0200,
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             SPACE=(TRK,0)
//DD2      DD  DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.DETAIL.VPSVNDBK,
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             SPACE=(TRK,0)
//DD3      DD  DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.SORTED.VNDBK060,
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             SPACE=(TRK,0)
//DD4      DD  DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.SORTED.VNDBK250,
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             SPACE=(TRK,0)
//************************************************
//*  ALLOCATE DATASETS
//************************************************
//STEP0020 EXEC PGM=IEFBR14,COND=(0,NE)
//DD1      DD  DSN=&GRPACR..ACRSQ.&ENV.DATA.VPSV300.STEP0200,
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),
//             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(121,(100,10)),AVGREC=U,
//             DCB=(RECFM=FBA,LRECL=121,DSORG=PS)
//************************************************
//*  VENDOR ADD/UPDATE RECORD BATCH CREATION    **
//************************************************
//STEP0100 EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01,COND=(0,NE)
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=D55.TEMP.LOAD,DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D55.PANEXEC.LOAD,DISP=SHR
//ABNLOG   DD DSN=D999.CFMVK.&ENV.MASTER.ABND,DISP=SHR
//ACRFILE  DD DSN=&GRPACR..ACRSQ.&ENV.DATA.VPSV300.STEP0200,
//            DISP=SHR
//VPSVNDOT DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.DETAIL.VPSVNDBK,
//            DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),
//            UNIT=SYSDA,
//            SPACE=(640,(50,20)),AVGREC=K,
//            DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=206,DSORG=PS)
//SYSABEND DD SYSOUT=*
//SYSOUT   DD SYSOUT=*
//SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=*
//SYSTSPRT DD SYSOUT=*
//*
//SYSTSIN DD DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(VPSV305&ENV),
//           DISP=SHR
//***************************************************************
//*****   STRIP DIVISION 060 OFF OF VENDOR BOOK FILE          ***
//***************************************************************
//STEP0200 EXEC PGM=SORT,COND=(0,NE)
//SORTLIB  DD  DSN=SYS1.SORTLIB,DISP=SHR
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*,
//             DCB=(BLKSIZE=121,LRECL=121,RECFM=FBA)

//             DCB=(BLKSIZE=121,LRECL=121,RECFM=FBA)

//*                                                                     08170016
//******************************************************************    08580027
//*  STEP0720 - DELETE PROGRAM DATA SETS                                08590024
//******************************************************************    08600023
//STEP0720 EXEC PGM=IEFBR14,                                            08610027
//            COND=(4,LE)                                               08310023
//DD1      DD  DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.DETAIL.VNDBOOK,                     09470023
//             UNIT=TAPE,                                               09480023
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),                                       09490023
//             DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=300,DSORG=PS)                        09510023
//DD2      DD  DSN=&GRPACR..ACRSQ.&ENV.DATA.&JOBNAME..STEP0620,         09520023
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              09530023
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),                                       09540023
//             SPACE=(121,(100,10),RLSE),AVGREC=U,                      09550023
//             DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=121,DSORG=PS)                        09560023
//DD3      DD  DSN=&GRPACR..ACRSQ.&ENV.DATA.&JOBNAME..STEP0650,         09520023
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              09530023
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),                                       09540023
//             SPACE=(121,(100,10),RLSE),AVGREC=U,                      09550023
//             DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=121,DSORG=PS)                        09560023
//********************************************************************
//* STEP0730 - CONNECT DIRECT VENDOR FILE TO TAX LAN
//********************************************************************
//STEP0730  EXEC PGM=DMBATCH,
//          REGION=1024K,
//          PARM=(YYSLYNN),COND=(4,LE)
//STEPLIB   DD DSN=SYS1.CD.LINKLIB,
//          DISP=SHR
//DMNETMAP  DD DSN=D955.NDM51.NETMAP,
//          DISP=SHR
//DMPUBLIB  DD DSN=D955.NDM.PROCESS.LIB,
//          DISP=SHR
//DMMSGFIL  DD DSN=D955.NDM.MSG,
//          DISP=SHR
//DMPRINT   DD SYSOUT=*
//SYSIN     DD DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(VPSV3051),
//          DISP=SHR
//*
//********************************************************************
//* STEP0740 - CONNECT DIRECT VENDOR FILE TO CALM LAN

//          REGION=1024K,

MEMBER NAME  VPSV350

//          DISP=SHR                                                    05590017

//**********************************************************************10550017
MEMBER NAME  VPSV460
//* #910959 03/25/04 08:17:54    PRODUCTION 03/25/04 16:30:02
//* #910959 01/07/04 07:51:03    PRODUCTION 01/20/04 11:00:05
//* #910995 12/10/02 15:31:22    PRODUCTION 12/11/02 11:00:12
//VPSV460  PROC ENV=P,                                                  00010001
//         GRP=D966,                                                    00020002
//         GEN0=+0,                                                     00020002
//         GEN1=+1,                                                     00020002
//         MODIFY=R                                                     00020002
//**********************************************************************00050001
//*  STEP0010 - DELETE CATALOGUED DATASETS LEFT OVER FROM LAST RUN      00060001
//*  STEP0020 - UPDATES PURGE YEAR ON VPS FILE TO BE CURRENT YEAR.      00070001
//*  STEP0030 - PULLS ACTIVE VENDORS OFF OF AR:M
//*  STEP0040 - RUNS VPSV460 TO CREATE REPORT AND/OR UPDATE STATUS
//**********************************************************************00170001
//STEP0010 EXEC PGM=IEFBR14
//DD1      DD  DSN=&GRP..ARMSQ.&ENV.RDETAIL.VPSIVEND,
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE,DELETE),
//             SPACE=(CYL,(5,5),RLSE)
//*
//**************************************************************
//*   THIS JOB UPDATES THE PURGE DATE ON THE AR3002 MASTER   ***
//*   FILE WITH THE CURRENT DATE.  THIS ELIMINATES THE NEED  ***
//*   FOR SOMEONE TO UPDATE THIS DATA MONTHLY BEFORE THE     ***
//*   PURGE RUNS.                                            ***
//**************************************************************
//STEP0020  EXEC PGM=ARM0200V
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=D55.TEMP.LOAD,
//             DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D55.PANEXEC.LOAD,
//             DISP=SHR
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*
//CTLIN    DD  DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.INPUT.VPSIVEND(&GEN0),
//             DISP=SHR
//CTLOUT   DD  DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.INPUT.VPSIVEND(&GEN1),
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             SPACE=(CYL,(2,1),RLSE),
//             DISP=(,CATLG,DELETE),
//             DCB=(GDG.MODEL,RECFM=FB,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=6160)
//**************************************************************
//*   THIS STEP PULLS VENDORS BASED ON PURGE DATE CRITERIA   ***
//*   SET UP IN PREVIOUS STEP.                               ***
//**************************************************************
//STEP0030 EXEC PGM=SORT
//SORTLIB  DD  DSN=SYS1.SORTLIB,DISP=SHR
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=X
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.INPUT.VPSIVEND(&GEN1),DISP=SHR
//SORTWK01 DD  UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(CYL,(10,5))
//SORTIN   DD  DSN=&GRP..ARMSQ.BRMASTER.AR3004C(0),DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=&GRP..ARMSQ.BLMASTER.AR3004C(0),DISP=SHR
//SORTOUT  DD  DSN=&GRP..ARMSQ.&ENV.RDETAIL.VPSIVEND,

//*  STEP0070 - RUN VPSC613 PROGRAM TO EXTRACT FLOAT VS AMT DETAILS     00160010
//*  STEP0080 - CATALOGUE EMPTY DATASETS NEEDED BY TEC1964 (VPSI704)    00170010
//*  STEP0090 - SORT EXTRACT RECORDS FOR INPUT TO FORMATTER, VPSC713    00180010
//*  STEP0100 - VPSC713 - CREATE AVERAGE FLOAT REPORT                   00190010
//**********************************************************************00200010
//*  STEP0010 - DELETE CATALOGUED DATASETS LEFT OVER FROM LAST RUN     *00210010
//**********************************************************************00220010
//STEP0010 EXEC PGM=IEFBR14                                             00230010
//DD1      DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.UNLOAD.&JOBNAME1..VPSCKREG,          00250010
//            UNIT=SYSDA,                                               00290010
//            DISP=(MOD,DELETE,DELETE),                                 00300010
//            SPACE=(CYL,(10,10),RLSE),AVGREC=K,                        00310010
//            DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=34,BLKSIZE=27200)                     00320010
//DD2      DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.CCARD.VPSU100,                            00280010
//            UNIT=SYSDA,                                               00290010
//            DISP=(MOD,DELETE,DELETE),                                 00300010
//            SPACE=(CYL,(1,1),RLSE),AVGREC=K,                          00310010
//            DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=80,DSORG=PS)                          00320010

//            UNIT=SYSDA,                                               00340010
//            DISP=(MOD,DELETE,DELETE),                                 00350010
//            SPACE=(CYL,(10,10),RLSE),AVGREC=K,                        00360010
//            DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=34,BLKSIZE=27200)                     00370010

//            UNIT=SYSDA,                                               00390010
//            DISP=(MOD,DELETE),                                        00400010
//            SPACE=(121,(20,2),RLSE),AVGREC=U,                         00410010
//            DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=121,DSORG=PS)                         00420010
//DD6      DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.DTLVPS.&JOBNAME1..EXTRACT,           00430010
//            UNIT=SYSDA,                                               00440010
//            DISP=(MOD,DELETE),                                        00450010
//            SPACE=(CYL,(10,10),RLSE),AVGREC=U,                        00460010

//            DISP=(MOD,DELETE),                                        00500010
//            SPACE=(CYL,(10,10),RLSE),AVGREC=K,                        00510010

//            SPACE=(CYL,(10,10),RLSE),AVGREC=K,                        00560010

//DD9      DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.INPUT03.&JOBNAME1..VPSCKREG,         00580010
//            UNIT=SYSDA,                                               00590010
//            DISP=(MOD,DELETE),                                        00600010
//            SPACE=(CYL,(10,10),RLSE),AVGREC=K,                        00610010
//            DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=34,BLKSIZE=27200)                     00620010
//DD10     DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.DATA.&JOBNAME2..ACRFILE,             00630010
//            UNIT=SYSDA,                                               00640010
//            DISP=(MOD,DELETE),                                        00650010
//            SPACE=(121,(1000,100),RLSE),AVGREC=U,                     00660010
//            DCB=(RECFM=FBA,LRECL=121,DSORG=PS)                        00670010

//            UNIT=SYSDA,                                               00690010
//            DISP=(MOD,DELETE),                                        00700010
//            SPACE=(300,(10,5),RLSE),AVGREC=K,                         00710010
//            DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=300,DSORG=PS)                         00720010
//**********************************************************************00730010
//*  STEP0020 - RUN VPSU100 PROGRAM TO CREATE CONTROL CARDS            *00740010
//**********************************************************************00750010
//STEP0020 EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01,                                           00760010
//            COND=(4,LE)                                               00770010
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00770011
//*                                                                     00780010
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=D55.TEMP.LOAD,DISP=SHR                               00790012
//         DD  DSN=D55.PANEXEC.LOAD,DISP=SHR                            00790013
//ABNLOG   DD DSN=&ABNLOG,DISP=SHR                                      00800010
//VPSFSTO  DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.CCARD.VPSU100,                            00810010
//            UNIT=SYSDA,                                               00820010
//            DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),                                  00830010
//            SPACE=(CYL,(1,1),RLSE),AVGREC=K,                          00840010
//            DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=80,DSORG=PS)                          00850010
//VPSSNDO  DD DSN=&&DUMMY,                                              00860010
//            UNIT=SYSDA,                                               00870010
//            DISP=(NEW,PASS),                                          00880010
//            SPACE=(CYL,(1,1),RLSE),AVGREC=K,                          00890010
//            DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=80,DSORG=PS)                          00900010
//VPSPARM  DD DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(VPSC613A),DISP=SHR                 00910010
//VPSFSTI  DD DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(VPSC613B),DISP=SHR                 00920010
//VPSSNDI  DD DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(VPSC613C),DISP=SHR                 00930010
//SYSTSIN  DD DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(VPSU100P),DISP=SHR                 00940010
//SYSABEND DD SYSOUT=&SOUT                                              00950010
//SYSOUT   DD SYSOUT=&SOUT                                              00970010
//SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=&SOUT                                              00980010
//SYSTSPRT DD SYSOUT=&SOUT                                              00990010
//**********************************************************************01000010
//*  STEP0030 - UNLOAD VPSCKREG                                        *01010010
//**********************************************************************01020010
//STEP0030 EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01,                                           01030010
//         DYNAMNBR=20,                                                 01040010
//         COND=(4,LT)                                                  01050010
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 01050011
//STEPLIB  DD DSN=DB2P.DB2.DSNEXIT,DISP=SHR                             01060010
//         DD DSN=DB2P.DB2.DSNLOAD,DISP=SHR                             01070010
//SYSOUT   DD SYSOUT=&SOUT                                              01080010
//SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=&SOUT                                              01090010
//SYSTSPRT DD SYSOUT=&SOUT                                              01100010
//SYSTSIN  DD DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SQLTIAUP),DISP=SHR                 01110010
//SYSREC00 DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.UNLOAD.&JOBNAME1..VPSCKREG,          01130010
//            UNIT=TAPE,RETPD=0030,                                     01140010
//            DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)                                   01150010
//SYSPUNCH DD SYSOUT=&SOUT                                              01160010
//SYSIN    DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.CCARD.VPSU100,DISP=SHR                    01170010
//**********************************************************************01180010
//*  STEP0040 - SORT TO CREATE 2 INPUT FILES.  ONE FOR US VENDORS      *01190010
//*             AND THE OTHER FOR FOREIGN VENDORS.                     *01200010
//**********************************************************************01210010
//STEP0040 EXEC PGM=SORT,                                               01220010
//         COND=(4,LT)                                                  01230010
//SORTLIB  DD DSN=SYS1.SORTLIB,DISP=SHR                                 01240010
//SORTIN   DD DSN=&GRP..VPSSQ.&ENV.UNLOAD.&JOBNAME1..VPSCKREG,          01250010
//            DISP=OLD,                                                 01260010

//FICHE    DD DUMMY                                                     02420010
//******* AVERAGE FLOAT DAYS REPORT ************************************02430010
