//*PROCDOC HDR - DAILY MAINTENANCE REQUIRED BY THE SON SYSTEM           00020000
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00050000
//* SONACSK  - AUTOMATED SHRINK ACCRUAL PROCESS FOR SON                 00060000
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00070000
//SONACSK EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01                                             00090000
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00100000
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=D55.TEMP.LOAD,DISP=SHR                               00110000
//         DD  DSN=D55.PANEXEC.LOAD,DISP=SHR                            00120000
//ABNLOG   DD  DSN=D999.CFMVK.PMASTER.ABND,DISP=SHR                     00130000
//SYSABEND DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00150000
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00160000
//SONDATE  DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONACSK.SONDATE,DISP=SHR                  00161000
//SOSDEPT  DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONACSK.SOSMAP,DISP=SHR                   00162000
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00170000
//SYSTSPRT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00180000
//SYSTSIN  DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SONACSKP),DISP=SHR                00190000
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00191000
//* SONACSK - END OF PROCEDURE                                          00650000
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00660000
MEMBER NAME  SONALLOC
//SONALLOC PROC DIV=XXX,                                                00000200
//             PEYTON=+1                                                00000400
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00000401
//* EMPTY  - CREATES EMPTY GENERATION OF INPUT DATASET                  00000402
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00000403
//EMPTY   EXEC PGM=SORT,COND=(3,LT)                                     00000404
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00000405
//SORTIN   DD  DUMMY,DCB=(LRECL=18,RECFM=FB,DSORG=PS)                   00000406
//SORTOUT  DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV&DIV..PEYTON(+1),                      00000407
//             SPACE=(CYL,(1,1),RLSE),                                  00000408
//             DISP=(,CATLG,DELETE),                                    00000409
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00000410
//             DCB=(GDG.MODEL,DSORG=PS,LRECL=18,RECFM=FB)               00000411
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SORTCOPY),DISP=SHR                00000412
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00000413
//* BACKUP KAS PEYTON ENTRIES                                           00000420
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00000430
//BACKUP  EXEC PGM=SORT,COND=(3,LT)                                     00000440
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00000450
//SORTIN   DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV&DIV..PEYTON,                          00000460
//             DISP=(OLD,DELETE,KEEP)                                   00000470
//SORTOUT  DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.BAK&DIV..PEYTON(&PEYTON),                 00000480
//             SPACE=(CYL,(1,5),RLSE),                                  00000490
//             DISP=(,CATLG,DELETE),                                    00000491
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00000492
//             DCB=(GDG.MODEL,DSORG=PS,LRECL=18,RECFM=FB)               00000493
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SORTCOPY),DISP=SHR                00000494
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00000500
//* XXG9001   - CHECKS FILE TO SEE IF EMPTY                             00000600
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00000700
//XXG9001  EXEC  PGM=XXG9001,COND=(3,LT)                                00000900
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00000901
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=D55.TEMP.LOAD,DISP=SHR                               00001302
//         DD  DSN=D55.PANEXEC.LOAD,DISP=SHR                            00001303
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00001400
//SYSUT1   DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.BAK&DIV..PEYTON(&PEYTON),                 00001600
//             DISP=OLD                                                 00001700
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00001900
//*   SCRATCH - SCRATCH INPUT IF DATASET(S) ARE BLANK                   00002000
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00002100
//SCRATCH EXEC PGM=IEFBR14,                                             00002120
//             COND=(4,NE,XXG9001)                                      00002130
//DD1      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.BAK&DIV..PEYTON(&PEYTON),                 00002140
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00002150
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE,DELETE),                                00002160
//             SPACE=(TRK,1)                                            00002170
//*--------------------------------------------------------------------*00002171
//ALLOCATE IF (XXG9001.RC = 0) THEN                                     00002180
//*--------------------------------------------------------------------*00012600
//* CREATE "75" RECORDS FOR PEYTON STANDARD CREDIT - ALLOCATED BASED   *00012700
//*        ON PTD SALES                                                *00012710
//*--------------------------------------------------------------------*00012800
//SONALLOC EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01                                            00012900
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00012901
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=D55.TEMP.LOAD,DISP=SHR                               00044502
//         DD  DSN=D55.PANEXEC.LOAD,DISP=SHR                            00044503
//SYSDUMP   DD  SYSOUT=*                                                00013000
//SYSABEND DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00013100
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00013100
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00013100
//SYSTSPRT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00013100
//*                                                                     00013200
//ABNLOG   DD  DSN=D999.CFMVK.PMASTER.ABND,DISP=SHR                     00013300
//RPTTYPE  DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV&DIV..RPTTYPE,DISP=SHR                 00013300
//TRANSDT  DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV&DIV..SONDATE,                         00013610
//             DISP=OLD                                                 00013620
//TOTCRED  DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.BAK&DIV..PEYTON(&PEYTON),                 00013700
//             DISP=SHR                                                 00013800
//FILEOUT  DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV&DIV..SONSYSIN(+2),                    00014300
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00014400
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),                                 00014500
//             SPACE=(CYL,(5,5),RLSE),                                  00014600
//             DCB=(GDG.MODEL,DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=200)              00014700
//SYSTSIN  DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SONALOCP),DISP=SHR                00014710
//ALLOCATE  ENDIF                                                       00014800
//*--------------------------------------------------------------------*00014900
MEMBER NAME  SONANYDA
//SONANYDA PROC DIV=XXX                                                 00000300
//*--------------------------------------------------------------------*00004800
//* CREATE FILE WITH PRIOR WEEK ENDING INVENTORY AND CURRENT WEEK      *00004900

//*--------------------------------------------------------------------*00005100
//SONANY1 EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01                                             00005200
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00005201
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=D55.TEMP.LOAD,DISP=SHR                               00005502
//         DD  DSN=D55.PANEXEC.LOAD,DISP=SHR                            00005503
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00005600
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00005800
//RPTTYPE  DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV&DIV..RPTTYPE,DISP=SHR                 00005900
//OUTFILE  DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV&DIV..ANYDAY(+1),                      00006300
//             SPACE=(CYL,(1,1),RLSE),                                  00006400
//             DISP=(,CATLG,DELETE),                                    00006500
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00006600
//             DCB=(GDG.MODEL,DSORG=PS,LRECL=52,RECFM=FB)               00006700
//SYSABEND DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00006710
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00006720
//SYSTSPRT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00006730
//SYSTSIN  DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SONANY1P),DISP=SHR                00006740
//*--------------------------------------------------------------------*00006800
//* SENDANY - SEND FILE TO RALPHS                                       00006900
//*--------------------------------------------------------------------*00007000
//*SENDANY  EXEC PGM=DMBATCH,PARM=(YYSLYNN)                             00007100

//*DMMSGFIL  DD DSN=D955.NDM.MSG,DISP=SHR                               00007300

MEMBER NAME  SONAR05
//*                                                                     00000100
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00000200
//*PROCDOC HDR - COPY SONDCON & SONDFALT FILES TO ACCEPTANCE REGION     00000300
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00000400
//*                                                                     00000500
//* THE FOLLOWING IS A LIST OF THE STEPS CONTAINED IN THIS PROC:        00000600

//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),                                 00002300
//             SPACE=(CYL,(2,1),RLSE),                                  00002400
//             DCB=(GDG.MODEL,RECFM=FB,LRECL=35,DSORG=PS)               00002500
//SYSIN   DD   DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SORTCOPY),DISP=SHR                00002600
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00003500
//* DEFINE1- DEFINE IAM SONDCON FILE                                    00003600
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00003700
//DEFINE1 EXEC PGM=IDCAMS,REGION=4096K                                  00003800
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00003900
//IAMOVRID DD  DSN=D966.KACSQ.IAMOVRID,DISP=SHR                         00004000
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(ASON&DIV.B),DISP=SHR              00004100
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00004300

MEMBER NAME  SONA9561
//SONA9561 PROC DIV='XXX',DIVCD='X',RESTART=''
//*********************************************************************
//*              STEP DESCRIPTIONS                                   **
//*              --------------------------------------------------  **
//*   STEP0005 - SET TABLESPACE SON001TS AND ITS INDEXES IN UT MODE  **
//*   STEP0010 - LOAD REPLACE SONSDGPR TABLE BY PARTITION            **
//*   STEP0020 - TEMINATE UTILITY ON STEP0010 ABEND                  **
//*   STEP0025 - START TABLESPACE SON001TS AND ITS INDEXES IN RW     ** 00000120
//*                                                                  **
//*              PROC CHANGES                                        **
//*              --------------------------------------------------  **
//*   10/28/02 SS PROC CREATED                                       **
//*   01/05/05 BM CHANGED STEP0020 LOGIC TO CANCEL THREAD WITH IF    **
//*   08/03/07 INCLUDE STEP0005 & STEP0025 TO SET TS AND IX IN UT    **
//*   07/19/07 SET UT AND RW BY PARTS ONLY                           **
//*                                                                  **
//*********************************************************************
//*   STEP0005 - SET TABLESPACE SON001TS AND ITS INDEXES IN UT MODE  **
//*   BY DIVISION LOADING PARTITION                                  **
//*********************************************************************
//*
//STEP0005 EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01,                                           00060000
//             DYNAMNBR=35,                                             00061000
//             PERFORM=21                                               00070000
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00070001
//PLIDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00080000
//SYSPROC  DD  DSN=SYS1.CMDPROC,                                        00090000
//             DISP=SHR                                                 00100000
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00110000
//SYSTSPRT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00120000
//SYSUDUMP DD  DUMMY                                                    00130000
//SYSTSIN  DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SON0UT1&DIVCD),                   00230000
//             DISP=SHR                                                 00240000
//*
//*********************************************************************
//*   STEP0010 - LOAD REPLACE SONSDGPR TABLE                         **
//*********************************************************************
//STEP0010 EXEC PGM=DSNUTILB,
//             PARM='DB20,,&RESTART'
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*
//UTPRINT  DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SON0L01&DIVCD),DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SON0LA1),DISP=SHR
//*
//SYSUT1   DD DSN=DB20.SON.SON1956&DIVCD..SYSUT1,
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE,CATLG),
//             UNIT=TAPE,
//             DCB=(IMSVS.DCB)                                          00001050
//SORTOUT  DD DSN=DB20.SON.SON1956&DIVCD..SORTOUT,
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE,CATLG),
//             UNIT=TAPE,
//             DCB=(IMSVS.DCB)                                          00001050
//SYSMAP   DD DSN=DB20.SON.SON1956&DIVCD..SYSMAP,
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE,CATLG),
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             SPACE=(CYL,(50,10))
//SYSERR   DD DSN=DB20.SON.SON1956&DIVCD..SYSERR,
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE,CATLG),
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             SPACE=(CYL,(50,10))
//SORTWK01 DD  UNIT=SYSDA,
//             SPACE=(CYL,(40,40))
//SORTWK02 DD  UNIT=SYSDA,
//             SPACE=(CYL,(40,40))
//SORTWK03 DD  UNIT=SYSDA,
//             SPACE=(CYL,(40,40))
//SORTWK04 DD  UNIT=SYSDA,
//             SPACE=(CYL,(40,40))
//SORTWK05 DD  UNIT=SYSDA,
//             SPACE=(CYL,(40,40))
//SORTWK06 DD  UNIT=SYSDA,
//             SPACE=(CYL,(40,40))
//IN01     DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.PMASTER.EXTB&DIV(0),
//             DISP=SHR
//SYSDISC  DD  SYSOUT=*
//********************************************************************* 00940000
//*   STEP0020 - TERMINATE THE DB2 LOAD UTILITY ON FAILURE           ** 00950000
//********************************************************************* 00960000
// IF STEP0010.ABEND = TRUE
// OR  STEP0010.RC > 4
// THEN
//STEP0020 EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01,                                           00970000
//             DYNAMNBR=20                                              00980000
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00980001
//SYSTSPRT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 01000000
//SYSTSIN  DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SON1TML&DIVCD),DISP=SHR           01010004
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 01030000
//SYSUDUMP DD  SYSOUT=*
// ENDIF
//*
//********************************************************************* 00000260
//*   STEP0025 - START TABLESPACE SON001TS AND ITS INDEXES IN RW     ** 00000120
//*   BY DIVISION PARTITION                                          ** 00000120
//********************************************************************* 00000260
//STEP0025 EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01,                                           00060000
//             DYNAMNBR=35,                                             00061000
//             PERFORM=21                                               00070000
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00070001
//PLIDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00080000

//             DISP=SHR                                                 00100000
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00110000
//SYSTSPRT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00120000
//SYSUDUMP DD  DUMMY                                                    00130000
//SYSTSIN  DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SONSRW1&DIVCD),                   00230000
//             DISP=SHR                                                 00240000
//********************************************************************* 00960000
//* END OF PROC SONA9561
//********************************************************************* 00960000
MEMBER NAME  SONBACT
//* #910957 07/30/99 20:06:47    PRODUCTION 08/02/99 11:00:30
//*                                                                     00010000
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00020000
//*PROCDOC HDR - DUMP ORS2KAS ACCOUNT FILE TO SEQUENTIAL BACKUP         00030000
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00040000
//*                                                                     00050000
//* THE FOLLOWING IS A LIST OF THE STEPS CONTAINED IN THIS PROC:        00060000
//*                                                                     00070000
//* DELETE  - DELETE FILE THAT CAUSES THIS JOB TO RUN                   00080001
//* BACKUP  - DUMP ORS2KAS ACCOUNT FILE TO SEQUENTIAL BACKUP            00090001
//*                                                                     00100000
//SONBACT PROC DIV='000'                                                00110000

//*                                                                     00020000
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00030000
//*PROCDOC HDR - DUMP STORE PROFILE TABLE TO SEQUENTIAL BACKUP          00040000
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00050000
//*                                                                     00060000
//* THE FOLLOWING IS A LIST OF THE STEPS CONTAINED IN THIS PROC:        00070000
//*                                                                     00080000
//* DELETE  - DELETE FILE THAT CAUSES THIS JOB TO RUN                   00090000
//* BACKUP  - DUMP STORE PROFILE TABLE TO SEQUENTIAL BACKUP             00100000
//* SONREORD- REORDER THE DEPARTMENT NUMBERS ON THE STORE PROFILE TABLE
//* BACKUP2 - DUMP STORE PROFILE TABLE TO SEQUENTIAL BACKUP AGAIN       00100000
//*                                                                     00110000
//SONBSTR PROC DIV='026'                                                00120000
//*                                                                     00130000
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00140000
//* DELETE  - DELETE FILE THAT CAUSES THIS JOB TO RUN AND FLAT FILE     00150000
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00160000
//*                                                                     00170000
//DELETE   EXEC PGM=IEFBR14                                             00180000
//DD1      DD  DSN=D966.FINSQ.PCONTROL.SONBS&DIV,                       00190000
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00200000
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),                                       00210000
//             SPACE=(TRK,1)                                            00220000
//DD2      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV&DIV..STORE.PROFILE.LANRES,            00230000
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00240000
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),                                       00250000
//             SPACE=(TRK,1)                                            00260000
//*                                                                     00270000
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00280000
//* BACKUP  - DUMP STORE PROFILE TABLE TO SEQUENTIAL BACKUP             00290000
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00300000
//*                                                                     00310000
//BACKUP  EXEC PGM=IDCAMS,REGION=4M                                     00320000
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00330000
//FILE     DD  DSN=D966.SONVK.DIV&DIV..STORE.PROFILE,                   00340000
//             DISP=OLD                                                 00350000
//BACKUP   DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV&DIV..STORE.PROFILE(+1),               00360000
//             SPACE=(CYL,(1,1),RLSE),                                  00370000
//             DISP=(,CATLG,DELETE),                                    00380000
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00390000
//             DCB=(GDG.MODEL,DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=900)              00400000
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SONBACK),DISP=SHR                 00410000
//*                                                                     00420000
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00280000
//* SONREORD- REORDER THE DEPARTMENT NUMBERS ON THE STORE PROFILE TABLE 00290000
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00300000
//*                                                                     00310000
//SONREORD EXEC PGM=SONREORD                                            01360000
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 01360001
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=D55.TEMP.LOAD,DISP=SHR                               01380004
//         DD  DSN=D55.PANEXEC.LOAD,DISP=SHR                            01380005
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 01410000
//INFILE   DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV&DIV..STORE.PROFILE(+1),               01440000
//             DISP=SHR                                                 01450000
//OUTFILE  DD  DSN=D966.SONVK.DIV&DIV..STORE.PROFILE,                   01460000
//             DISP=SHR                                                 01470000
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00280000
//* BACKUP2 - DUMP STORE PROFILE TABLE TO SEQUENTIAL BACKUP AGAIN       00290000
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00300000
//*                                                                     00310000
//BACKUP2 EXEC PGM=IDCAMS,REGION=4M                                     00320000
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00330000
//FILE     DD  DSN=D966.SONVK.DIV&DIV..STORE.PROFILE,                   00340000
//             DISP=OLD                                                 00350000
//BACKUP   DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV&DIV..STORE.PROFILE(+1),DISP=SHR       00360000
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SONBACK),DISP=SHR                 00410000
//*                                                                     00420000
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00430000
//* FLATDD  - CREATE BACKUP FLAT FILE FOR LANRES JOBS                   00440000
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00450000
//*                                                                     00460000
//SORT1   EXEC PGM=SORT,                                                00470000
//             PARM='CORE=MAX-160K,EQUALS'                              00480000
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*,                                                00490000
//             DCB=(RECFM=FA,LRECL=121,BLKSIZE=121)                     00500000
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SORTCOPY),                        00510000
//             DISP=SHR                                                 00520000
//SORTIN   DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV&DIV..STORE.PROFILE(+1),DISP=SHR       00530000
//SORTOUT  DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV&DIV..STORE.PROFILE.LANRES,            00540000
//             SPACE=(CYL,(1,1),RLSE),                                  00550000
//             DISP=(,CATLG,DELETE),                                    00560000
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00570000

//SORTWK01 DD  UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00590000
//             SPACE=(CYL,5)                                            00600000
//SORTWK02 DD  UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00610000
//             SPACE=(CYL,5)                                            00620000
//SORTWK03 DD  UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00630000

MEMBER NAME  SONBUSP
//SONBUSP PROC DIV=STP,
//             ENV='P'                                                  00004300
//*
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***06030005
//* BACKUP  - BACKUP ALL INPUT                                          06040019
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***06050005
//*                                                                     06060005
//BACKUP  EXEC PGM=SORT                                                 06070019
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 06080005
//SORTIN   DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV&DIV..CROSSDIV,                        06090010
//             DISP=(OLD,DELETE,KEEP)                                   06100005
//SORTOUT  DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.BAK&DIV..CROSSDIV(+1),                    06110007
//             SPACE=(CYL,(5,10),RLSE),                                 06120005
//             DISP=(,CATLG,DELETE),                                    06130005
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              06140005
//             DCB=(GDG.MODEL,DSORG=PS,LRECL=31,RECFM=FB)               06150005
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SORTCOPY),DISP=SHR                06151015
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***06070000
//* SONBUSP - UPDATE ACCRUAL % ON STORE PROFILE TABLES                  06080000
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***06090000
//SONBUSP  EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=D55.TEMP.LOAD,DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D55.PANEXEC.LOAD,DISP=SHR
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*
//ABNLOG   DD  DSN=D999.CFMVK.PMASTER.ABND,DISP=SHR
//CROSDIV  DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.BAK&DIV..CROSSDIV(+1),DISP=SHR            06160000
//SYSABEND DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSTSPRT DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSTSIN  DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SONBUSP&ENV.),DISP=SHR
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***06160005
//*    END OF SONBUSP PROC                                              06170000
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***06180005
MEMBER NAME  SONCBS
//SONCBS PROC JOBNAME='SONCBS'                                          00000100
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00000200
//*PROCDOC HDR - REFORMAT SYSTEM GENERATED RECORD                       00000300
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00000400
//*                                                                     00000500
//* THE FOLLOWING IS A LIST OF THE STEPS CONTAINED IN THIS PROC.        00000600
//*                                                                     00000700
//* DELETE  - DELETE INTERNAL DATASETS                                  00000800
//* SRTCBS  - SORTS CBS RECORDS FOR UACR COUNT                          00000900
//* SASCBSA - CHANGE DIV 035 TO 034                                     00001000
//* SASS2   - STRIP REC TYPE '1' (TOT FOR DIV/STOR BY ACCT)             00001100
//* SRTCBSA - CREATE BACKUP OF CBS FILE                                 00001200
//* SORTACT - SORT ORS2KAC ACCT FILE                                    00001300
//* SON0010 - REFORMATS SYSTEM GENERATED ENTRIES                        00001700
//* DUMPXXX - DUMP DIVISIONAL SONSTDCR VSAM FILES TO SEQUENTIAL         00001800
//* SORTDIV - SORT DIVISIONAL SEQUENTIAL FILES INTO MASTER SEQUENTIAL   00001900
//* DELETE3 - DELETE SONSTDCR VSAM                                      00002000
//* DEFINE3 - DEFINE SONSTDCR VSAM                                      00002100
//* REPRO3  - REPRO SONSTDCR                                            00002200
//* SON0040 - CREATE 75 RECORDS FOR STANDARD CREDIT                     00002300
//* SORT20  - CREATE BACK UP OF CBS 'NO ACCOUNT' FILE                   00002400
//* SORT50  - SORT INPUT TO CBS DIVISION FILE                           00002500
//* SASS4   - CHANGE RECORDS FOR DIV 035 FOR DIV 034                    00002600
//* SASS4B  - REMOVE RECORDS WITH '0000000' ACCOUNT NUMBER              00002700
//* SORT03  - SORT ALL INPUT TO DIV FILE                                00002800
//* SORT04  - BACK UP ALL INPUT                                         00002900
//*                                                                     00003000
//*---------------------------------------------------------------***   00003100
//* DELETE   - DELETE INTERNAL DATASETS                                 00003200
//*---------------------------------------------------------------***   00003300
//*                                                                     00003400
//DELETE   EXEC PGM=IEFBR14                                             00003500
//DD1      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.PSORTED.CBSREC,                           00003600
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00003700
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE,DELETE),                                00003800
//             SPACE=(TRK,(1))                                          00003900
//DD2      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.PDETAIL.CBSCHG,                           00004000
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00004100
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE,DELETE),                                00004200
//             SPACE=(TRK,(1))                                          00004300
//DD3      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.PINPUT.GOODCBS,                           00004400
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00004500
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE,DELETE),                                00004600
//             SPACE=(TRK,(1))                                          00004700
//*-----------------------------------------------------------------    00004800
//* SRTCBS - SORTS CBS RECORDS FOR UACR COUNT                           00004900
//*-----------------------------------------------------------------    00005000
//SRTCBS  EXEC PGM=SORT                                                 00005100
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=D55.TEMP.LOAD,DISP=SHR                               00005200
//         DD  DSN=D55.PANEXEC.LOAD,DISP=SHR                            00005300
//SYSOUT   DD  DSN=D900.ACRSQ.PDATA.&JOBNAME,                           00005400
//             SPACE=(TRK,(15,15),RLSE),                                00005500
//             DISP=(,CATLG,DELETE),                                    00005600
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00005700
//             DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=121,BLKSIZE=121)                     00005800
//SORTIN   DD  DSN=D911.CBSSQ.PDETAIL.KMAPTDW,                          00005900
//             DISP=SHR                                                 00006000
//SORTOUT  DD  DUMMY,                                                   00006100
//             DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=133,BLKSIZE=13300)                   00006200
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SORTCOPY),                        00006300
//             DISP=SHR                                                 00006400
//*                                                                     00006500
//*-----------------------------------------------------------------    00007200
//* SASCBSA - CHANGE DIV 035 TO 034                                     00007300
//*-----------------------------------------------------------------    00007400
//*                                                                     00007500
//*SASCBSA  EXEC PGM=KRGSASS
//*CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*
//*STEPLIB  DD  DSN=D55.TEMP.LOAD,DISP=SHR
//*         DD  DSN=D55.PANEXEC.LOAD,DISP=SHR
//*SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*
//*SYSUT1   DD  DSN=D911.CBSSQ.PDETAIL.KMAPTDW,
//*             DISP=SHR
//*SYSUT2   DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.PDETAIL.CBSCHG,
//*             UNIT=SYSDA,
//*             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),
//*             SPACE=(CYL,(50,50),RLSE),
//*             DCB=(D900.PREPORTS.MODEL)
//*SYSUT3   DD  DUMMY,
//*             DCB=(D900.PREPORTS.MODEL)
//*SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SASSCBS2),
//*             DISP=SHR
//*
//*-----------------------------------------------------------------    00009800
//*  SASS2 - STRIP REC TYPE '1' (TOT FOR DIV/STOR BY ACCT)              00009900
//*-----------------------------------------------------------------    00010000
//*                                                                     00010100
//SASS2    EXEC PGM=KRGSASS                                             00010202
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00010203
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=D55.TEMP.LOAD,DISP=SHR                               00010602
//         DD  DSN=D55.PANEXEC.LOAD,DISP=SHR                            00010603
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00010700
//SYSUT1   DD  DSN=D911.CBSSQ.PDETAIL.KMAPTDW,
//             DISP=SHR                                                 00010900
//SYSUT3   DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.PSORTED.CBSREC,                           00011000
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00011100
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),                                 00011200
//             SPACE=(CYL,(50,50),RLSE),                                00011300
//             DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=133,BLKSIZE=13300)                   00011400
//SYSUT2   DD  DUMMY,                                                   00011500
//             DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=133,BLKSIZE=13300)                   00011600
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SASSCBS),                         00011700
//             DISP=SHR                                                 00011800
//*                                                                     00011900
//*-----------------------------------------------------------------    00012000
//* SRTCBSA - CREATE BACKUP OF CBS FILE                                 00012100
//*-----------------------------------------------------------------    00012200
//SRTCBSA EXEC PGM=SORT                                                 00012300
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=D55.TEMP.LOAD,DISP=SHR                               00012702
//         DD  DSN=D55.PANEXEC.LOAD,DISP=SHR                            00012703
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*,                                                00012800
//             DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=121,BLKSIZE=121)                     00012900
//SORTIN   DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.PSORTED.CBSREC,                           00013000
//             DISP=SHR                                                 00013100
//SORTOUT  DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.BACKUP.CBSREC(+1),                        00013200
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00013300
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),                                 00013400
//             SPACE=(CYL,(50,50),RLSE),                                00013500
//             DCB=(GDG.MODEL,DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=133)              00013600
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SORTCOPY),                        00013700
//             DISP=SHR                                                 00013800
//*---------------------------------------------------------------***   00021500
//*SON0010 - REFORMATS SYSTEM GENERATED ENTRIES                         00021600
//*---------------------------------------------------------------***   00021700
//SON0010 EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01                                             00008300

//         DD  DSN=D55.PANEXEC.LOAD,DISP=SHR                            00022203
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*
//ABNLOG   DD  DSN=D999.CFMVK.PMASTER.ABND,DISP=SHR
//NOACTDSD DD  DUMMY,                                                   00022300

//CBSFILE  DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.PSORTED.CBSREC,                           00023600

MEMBER NAME  SONCLS01
//* THE FOLLOWING IS A LIST OF THE STEPS CONTAINED IN THIS PROC.        00050005
//*                                                                     00060005
//* BACKUP  - BACKUP ALL INPUT                                          00332007
//* CONVERT - CONVERT ALL 035 DIV ENTRIES TO 034 FOR TOBACCO RETURNS    06040019
//* SPLIT1  - SPLIT SUPPLY DEPTS (20 - 39)                              01080000
//* SONRIP  - SPLIT THE DUMMY STORE AND VALID STORE                     01080000
//* SPLIT2  - SPLIT ALL INPUT TO DIV SONINPUT FILE                      01080000
//* SPLIT3  - SPLIT ALL INPUT TO DIV FILE FOR CREATING JE               01080000
//*
//SONCLS01 PROC DIV=XXX,
//             CRS='+1'                                                 00001100
//*
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***06030005
//* BACKUP  - BACKUP ALL INPUT                                          06040019
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***06050005
//BACKUP  EXEC PGM=SORT                                                 06070019
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 06080005
//SORTIN   DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV&DIV..CROSSDIV,                        06090010
//             DISP=(OLD,DELETE,KEEP)                                   06100005
//SORTOUT  DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.BAK&DIV..CROSSDIV(&CRS),                  06110007

//*                                                                     00140000
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00150000

//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00490000

//FILEDELH EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01                                            00520000

//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00530000

MEMBER NAME  SONDSDR
//SONDSD PROC DIV='XXX'                                                 00001900
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00001901
//*  STEP0010 - DELETE DATASETS FROM LAST EXECUTION                     00001902
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00001903
//DELETE  EXEC PGM=IEFBR14                                              00001904
//DD1     DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.PDETAIL.KMA&DIV..SON,                      00001905
//            UNIT=SYSDA,                                               00001906
//            DISP=(MOD,DELETE),                                        00001907
//            SPACE=(TRK,1)                                             00001908

MEMBER NAME  SONFCB
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00000300
//*PROCDOC HDR - REFORMAT SYSTEM GENERATED RECORD                       00000400
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00000500
//*                                                                     00000600
//* THE FOLLOWING IS A LIST OF THE STEPS CONTAINED IN THIS PROC.        00000700
//*                                                                     00000800
//* SRTFCB  - SORTS FCB RECORDS FOR UACR COUNT                          00000900
//* SRTFCB2 - SORT FCB SCAN DOWN RECORDS FOR UACR                       00001000
//* SASS1   - STRIP REC TYPE '1' (GRP/DEPT BREAK)                       00001100
//* BACKWRK - CREATES A BACKUP OF THE FCB WRKFILE                       00001200
//* BACKMAN - CREATE BACKUP OF FCB MANUAL CHARGE FILE                   00001300
//* BACVEND - CREATE BACKUP OF FCB SCAN VEND FILE                       00001310
//* SON0010 - REFORMATS SYSTEM GENERATED ENTRIES                        00001400
//* BACKALL - BACK UP ALL INPUT                                         00001500
//*                                                                     00001600
//SONFCB PROC DIV='XXX',    /* 3 DIGIT DIVISION NUMBER      */          00001700
//            FCB='XX'      /* 2 DIGIT DIVISION USED BY FCB */          00001800
//*                                                                     00001900
//*-----------------------------------------------------------------    00002000

MEMBER NAME  SONFORE
//*                     MODIFICATION HISTORY                            00000200
//*  WHO     REASON                                        DATE         00000300
//* -----   ---------------------------------------------- -----------  00000400
//* RLP     NEW PROC                                       02/20/2003   00000500
//*                                                                     00000600
//*                                                                     00000700
//* THE FOLLOWING IS A LIST OF THE STEPS CONTAINED IN THIS PROC:        00000800
//*                                                                     00000900
//* STEP       DESCRIPTION *                                            00001000
//* --------   ------------------------------------------------------*  00001100
//* SORTMAST   SORT THE MASTER FILE IN DESCENDING ORDER                 00001200
//* SON3065    CREATE CYCLE TO DATE MASTER FILE                         00001300
//* SORTMAS2   SORT THE MASTER FILE IN DESCENDING ORDER                 00001400
//* DELMAST    DELETE IAM MASTER FILE                                   00001500
//* DEFMAST    DEFINE IAM MASTER FILE                                   00001600
//* REPMAST    REPRO IAM MASTER FILE                                    00001700
//* SORT80     CREATE DUMMY GENS OF INPUT                               00001800
//* SORTINPT   SEPERATE THE BOOKED STORES FROM COUNTED STORES           00001900
//* XXG9001    CHECKS TO SEE IF INPUT IS EMPTY                          00002000
//* SON3075B   CREATE FORECASTED SHRINK REPORT FOR BOOKED STORES        00002100
//* XXG9002    CHECKS TO SEE IF INPUT IS EMPTY                          00002200
//* SON3075C   CREATE FORECASTED SHRINK REPORT FOR COUNTED STORES       00002300
//* SORTOUT1   SORT BOOKED REPORT BY DEPARTMENT AND WEEKS UNTIL INV     00002400
//* SORTOUT2   SORT COUNTED REPORT BY DEPARTMENT AND WEEKS UNTIL INV    00002500
//* RPTSEND    SEND THE TWO REPORTS BACK TO THE KMA -COMMA DELIMITED    00002600
//*                                                                     00002700
//SONFORE PROC DIV='021'                                                00002800
//*                                                                     00002900
//*---------------------------------------------------------------***   00003000
//* DELETEA  - DELETE INTERNAL DATASETS                                 00003100
//*---------------------------------------------------------------***   00003200
//*                                                                     00003300
//DELETEA  EXEC PGM=IEFBR14                                             00003400
//DD1      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV&DIV..SON3065.INPUT,                   00003500
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00003600
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE,DELETE),                                00003700
//             SPACE=(TRK,(1))                                          00003800
//DD2      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV&DIV..SON3065.OUTPUT,                  00003900
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00004000
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE,DELETE),                                00004100
//             SPACE=(TRK,(1))                                          00004200
//DD3      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV&DIV..SON3075.INPUTB,                  00004300
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00004400
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE,DELETE),                                00004500
//             SPACE=(TRK,(1))                                          00004600
//DD4      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV&DIV..SON3075.INPUTC,                  00004700
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00004800
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE,DELETE),                                00004900
//             SPACE=(TRK,(1))                                          00005000
//DD5      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV&DIV..SON3075.OUTPUTB,                 00005100
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00005200
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE,DELETE),                                00005300
//             SPACE=(TRK,(1))                                          00005400
//DD6      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV&DIV..SON3075.OUTPUTC,                 00005500
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00005600
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE,DELETE),                                00005700
//             SPACE=(TRK,(1))                                          00005800
//DD7      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV&DIV..SON3065.OUTPUT2,                 00005900
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00006000
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE,DELETE),                                00006100
//             SPACE=(TRK,(1))                                          00006200
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00006300
//*  SORTMAST    SORT THE MASTER FILE IN DESCENDING ORDER               00006400
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00006500
//SORTMAST EXEC PGM=SORT                                                00006600
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00006700
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00006800
//SORTIN   DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV&DIV..SONMAST(0),                      00006900
//             DISP=SHR                                                 00007000
//SORTOUT  DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV&DIV..SON3065.INPUT,                   00007100
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00007200
//             DISP=(,CATLG,DELETE),                                    00007300
//             SPACE=(CYL,(15,10),RLSE),                                00007400
//             DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=630,DSORG=PS)                        00007500
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SONFORE),                         00007600
//             DISP=SHR                                                 00007700
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00007800
//*  SON3065-CREATE CYCLE TO DATE MASTER FILE                           00007900
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00008000
//SON3065 EXEC PGM=SON3065                                              00008100
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00008101
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=D55.TEMP.LOAD,DISP=SHR                               00008402

//CHECK3   IF (XXGSHNE.RC = 0) THEN

//         SON0030.RC  ^= 0 OR SON0035.RC ^= 0 OR

MEMBER NAME  SONPULL
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00000400
//*PROCDOC HDR - MOVES ALL INPUT FILES INTO INPUT DSN                   00000500
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00000600
//*                                                                     00002900
//SONPULL  PROC DIV='XXX',                                              00003000
//         INGEN=(+3)                                                   00003100
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00003200
//* EMPTY  - CREATES EMPTY GENERATION OF INPUT DATASET                  00003300
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00003400
//EMPTY   EXEC PGM=SORT,COND=(4,LT)                                     00003500
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00003600
//SORTIN   DD  DUMMY,DCB=(LRECL=200,RECFM=FB,DSORG=PS)                  00003700
//SORTOUT  DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV&DIV..SONINPUT&INGEN,                  00003800
//             SPACE=(CYL,(25,25),RLSE),                                00003900
//             DISP=(,CATLG,DELETE),                                    00004000
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00004100
//             DCB=(GDG.MODEL,DSORG=PS,LRECL=200,RECFM=FB)              00004200
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SORTCOPY),DISP=SHR                00004300
//*                                                                     00004400
//*---------------------------------------------------------------***   00004500
//* DELETEA  - DELETE INTERNAL DATASETS                                 00004600
//*---------------------------------------------------------------***   00004700
//*                                                                     00004800
//DELETEA  EXEC PGM=IEFBR14,COND=(4,LT)                                 00004900
//DD2      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV&DIV..CBSACCT,                         00005000
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00005100

//             SPACE=(TRK,(1))                                          00005300

//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00006300
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE,DELETE),                                00006400
//             SPACE=(TRK,(1))                                          00006500
//*-----------------------------------------------------------------    00007400
//*SRT200  - CREATES DUMMY GENERATIONS OF CBS FILE                      00007500
//*-----------------------------------------------------------------    00007600
//SRT200  EXEC PGM=SORT,COND=(4,LT)                                     00007700

MEMBER NAME  SONP950F
//* #999149 05/11/00 16:46:39    PRODUCTION 05/15/00 16:30:08
//SONP950F PROC
//*********************************************************************
//*   THIS PROC DOES A FULL IMAGE COPY FOR THE                       **
//*   SONGRSHK TABLE - TABLE SPACE SON005TS                          **
//*   SONSLSAJ TABLE - TABLE SPACE SON006TS                          **
//*   SONINVAJ TABLE - TABLE SPACE SON007TS                          **
//*   SONSTOCH TABLE - TABLE SPACE SON008TS                          **
//*   SONSTSLS TABLE - TABLE SPACE SON009TS                          **
//*   SONINVRT TABLE - TABLE SPACE SON010TS                          **
//*   SONINVCS TABLE - TABLE SPACE SON011TS                          **
//*   SONFCBAJ TABLE - TABLE SPACE SON014TS                          **
//*                                                                  **
//*              STEP DESCRIPTIONS                                   **
//*              --------------------------------------------------  **
//*   STEP0010 - STOP DB, START RO                                   **
//*   STEP0020 - IMAGE COPY TABLE SPACES                             **
//*   STEP0030 - TERMINATES DB2 IMAGE COPY UTILITY ON COPY FAILURE   **
//*   STEP0040 - START DB RW                                         **
//*                                                                  **
//*              PROC CHANGES                                        **
//*              --------------------------------------------------  **
//*  06/26/09 ND MODIFIED TO USE TEMPLATE                            **
//*                                                                  **
//*********************************************************************
//********************************************************************* 00000040
//*   STEP0010 - START SONDB READ ONLY                               ** 00000090
//********************************************************************* 00000150
//STEP0010 EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSTSPRT DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSTSIN  DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SONPSRO),DISP=SHR
//*
//*********************************************************************
//*   STEP0020 - IMAGE COPY SON DB2P TABLE SPACES                    **
//*********************************************************************
//STEP0020 EXEC PGM=DSNUTILB,
//         PARM='DB2P,,'
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=DB2P.DB2.DSNLOAD,DISP=SHR
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00000131
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00000180
//UTPRINT  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00000190
//SYSUDUMP DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SONPFIC1),
//             DISP=SHR
//*
//*********************************************************************
//*   STEP0030 - TERMINATES DB2 IMAGE COPY UTILITY ON COPY FAILURE   **
//*********************************************************************
//STEP0030 EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01,
//             DYNAMNBR=20,
//             COND=ONLY
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSTSPRT DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSTSIN  DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SONPTMF1),
//             DISP=SHR
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*
//*
//********************************************************************* 00000040
//*   STEP0040 - START SONDB DATABASE READ/WRITE                     ** 00000090
//********************************************************************* 00000150
//STEP0040 EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01,
//             COND=(4,LT)
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSTSPRT DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSTSIN  DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SONPSRW),DISP=SHR

//*              END OF PROCEDURE                                    **

MEMBER NAME  SONSPLIY
//* THE FOLLOWING IS A LIST OF THE STEPS CONTAINED IN THIS PROC.        00050005
//*                                                                     00060005
//* DUMGEN  - CREATE DUMMY GENERATION OF INPUT TO STOP JCL ERRORS       00332007
//* BACKUP  - BACKUP ALL INPUT                                          00332007
//* SONRIP  - SPLIT THE INPUT INTO VALID AND DUMMY STORES               00332007
//* SPLIT   - SPLIT SON INPUT TO DIVISION FILES                         01080000
//*
//SONSPLIY PROC DIV=XXX
//*
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00130000
//* DUMGEN  - CREATE DUMMY GENERATION OF INPUT TO STOP JCL ERRORS       00140000
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00150000
//STEP010 EXEC PGM=KACXXXX                                              00190000
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00200000
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=D55.TEMP.LOAD,DISP=SHR                               00210000
//         DD  DSN=D55.PANEXEC.LOAD,DISP=SHR                            00220000
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00230000
//FILE01   DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV&DIV..CROSSDIV(+1),                    00240000
//             SPACE=(CYL,(1,1),RLSE),                                  00250000
//             DISP=(,CATLG,DELETE),                                    00260000
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00270000
//             DCB=(GDG.MODEL,DSORG=PS,LRECL=200,RECFM=FB)              00280000
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***06030005
//* BACKUP  - BACKUP ALL INPUT                                          06040019
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***06050005
//*                                                                     06060005
//BACKUP  EXEC PGM=SORT                                                 06070019
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 06080005
//SORTIN   DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV&DIV..CROSSDIV,                        06090010
//             DISP=(OLD,DELETE,KEEP)                                   06100005
//SORTOUT  DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.BAK&DIV..CROSSDIV(+1),                    06110007
//             SPACE=(CYL,(5,10),RLSE),                                 06120005
//             DISP=(,CATLG,DELETE),                                    06130005
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              06140005
//             DCB=(GDG.MODEL,DSORG=PS,LRECL=200,RECFM=FB)              06150005
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SORTCOPY),DISP=SHR                06151015
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00007310
//*  DELETE   - DELETE DATASETS FROM LAST EXECUTION                     00007311
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00007312
//DELETE   EXEC PGM=IEFBR14                                             00007313
//DD1      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV&DIV..DUMSTR,                          00007314
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00007315
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),                                       00007316
//             SPACE=(TRK,1)                                            00007317
//DD2      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV&DIV..VALSTR,                          00007318

//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),                                       00007320
//             SPACE=(TRK,1)                                            00007321
//*---------------------------------------------------------------***   00074700

//*---------------------------------------------------------------***   00074700

MEMBER NAME  SONSTCBS
//SONSTCBS PROC
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***
//*  STEP0010 - DELETE DATASETS FROM LAST EXECUTION                  ***
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***
//STEP0010 EXEC PGM=IEFBR14
//DD1      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.STDCBS01,
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),
//             SPACE=(TRK,1)
//DD2      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.STDCBS02,
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),
//             SPACE=(TRK,1)
//DD3      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.STDCBS03,
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),
//             SPACE=(TRK,1)
//DD4      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.STDCBS04,
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),
//             SPACE=(TRK,1)
//DD5      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.STDCBS05,
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),
//             SPACE=(TRK,1)
//DD6      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.STDCBS06,
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),
//             SPACE=(TRK,1)
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***
//* STEP0020 - COMBINE ROLLING 4 QUARTERS CBS SHIPMENT INFORMATION
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***
//STEP0020 EXEC PGM=SORT
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SORTCOPY),
//             DISP=SHR
//SORTIN   DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.CBSSHIP(0),DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.CBSSHIP(-1),DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.CBSSHIP(-2),DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.CBSSHIP(-3),DISP=SHR
//SORTOUT  DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.STDCBS01,
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),
//             SPACE=(CYL,(100,20),RLSE),
//             DCB=(*.SORTIN)
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***
//* STEP0030 - CBS WAREHOUSE ACTIVITY TAKEN INTO ACCOUNT
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***
//STEP0030 EXEC PGM=SORT
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*
//SORTIN   DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.STDCBS01,DISP=SHR
//SORTOUT  DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.STDCBS02,
//             SPACE=(CYL,(100,20),RLSE),
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=50)
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SONSTD07),DISP=SHR
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***
//* STEP0040 -ROLL UP ACTIVITY OF DEPT 07 TO 17
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***
//STEP0040 EXEC PGM=SORT
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*
//SORTIN   DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.STDCBS02,DISP=SHR
//SORTOUT  DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.STDCBS03,
//             SPACE=(CYL,(100,20),RLSE),
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=50)
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SONSTD08),DISP=SHR
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***
//* STEP0050 - SUM UP SHIPMENT COSTS ON DEPT/DIVISION LEVEL
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***
//STEP0050 EXEC  PGM=SORT
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*
//SORTIN   DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.STDCBS03,
//             DISP=SHR
//SORTOUT  DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.STDCBS04,

//             UNIT=SYSDA,DCB=(*.SORTIN)
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SONSTD09),DISP=SHR
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***
//* STEP0060 - BUILD RECORDS ON THE RECAP DEPARTMENT LEVEL
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***
//STEP0060 EXEC  PGM=SORT
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*
//SORTIN   DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.STDCBS04,
//             DISP=SHR
//SORTOUT  DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.STDCBS05,
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),SPACE=(CYL,(100,20),RLSE),
//             UNIT=SYSDA,DCB=(*.SORTIN)
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SONSTD10),DISP=SHR

//*------------------------------------------------------------------***

//*------------------------------------------------------------------***

//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*

//*------------------------------------------------------------------***

//*------------------------------------------------------------------***
//STEP0080 EXEC  PGM=ICETOOL
//TOOLMSG  DD  SYSOUT=*
//DFSMSG   DD  SYSOUT=*

//IN2 DD DSN=D966.SONSQ.STDSPL02,DISP=SHR

//      SPACE=(CYL,(100,20)),DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)
//T2 DD DSN=D966.SONSQ.STDSPL06,UNIT=SYSDA,
//      SPACE=(CYL,(100,20)),DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)
//T3 DD DSN=D966.SONSQ.STDSPL07,UNIT=SYSDA,
//      SPACE=(CYL,(100,20)),DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)
//T4 DD DSN=D966.SONSQ.STDSPL08,UNIT=SYSDA,
//      SPACE=(CYL,(100,20)),DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)
//TOOLIN   DD DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SONSTDT1),DISP=SHR

//*------------------------------------------------------------------***

//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*

//* DUMP029 - DUMP DIVISION 029 TO SEQUENTIAL                           00200000

MEMBER NAME  SONUPDT
//* THE FOLLOWING IS A LIST OF THE STEPS CONTAINED IN THIS PROC:        00000100
//*                                                                     00000200
//* STEP       DESCRIPTION *                                            00000300
//* --------   ------------------------------------------------------*  00000400
//* SORT30  - CREATE BACKUP COPY OF DSD RECORDS                         00000500
//* SORT40  - CREATE BACKUP COPY OF CBS RECORDS                         00000600
//* STEP0020- CREATES CBS NO ACCOUNT REPORT                             00000700
//* DELETE  - DELETE ALL THE DATASETS USED IN THIS PROC                 00000800
//* SON9700 - CONVERT DEPARTMENT NUMBER ACCORDING TO SONDCON            00000900
//* SON9710 - CONVERT DSD ACCTS TO CONVERTED DEPT'S ACCTS               00001000
//* SORT01  - SORT ALL INPUT AND CREATE BACKUP FILE                     00001100
//* SON0020 - LOOK FOR DUPLICATE INPUT CARDS                            00001200
//* SORT02  - SORT SON0020 OUTPUT FOR NEXT STEP                         00001300
//* SON0030 - EDIT INPUT AND CREATE REJECT REPORT                       00001400
//* SORTRPT - CREATE COMBINED INPUT EDIT REPORT                         00001500
//* SONSHINE- CREATE INPUT RECORDS FOR EVERY STORE/DEPT COMBINATION     00001600
//* SORT03  - SORT VALID INPUT CARDS                                    00001700
//* SON1010 - REFORMAT VALID INPUT INTO MASTER FILE FORMAT              00001800
//* SORT04  - SORT RECORDS BY MASTER KEY                                00001900
//* DELMAST - DELETE IAM MASTER FILE                                    00002000
//* DEFMAST - DEFINE IAM MASTER FILE                                    00002100
//* REPMAST - REPRO IAM MASTER FILE                                     00002200
//* SON1030 - PERFORM AMAZING CALCULATIONS (WOW!)                       00002300
//* DUMPMST - DUMP IAM MASTER FILE TO SEQUENTIAL                        00002400
//* SON1040 - CREATE SHOW STOPPER REPORT                                00002500
//* DUMPDPT - DUMP DEPARTMENT FILE TO SEQUENTIAL                        00002600
//* SONRUNR - CREATE RECAP RPTTYPE FILE                                 00060600
//* SORT7501- SORT THE 75 RECORDS INTO KEY ORDER                        00002700
//* SON3005 - SUM THE MASTER FILE BY DIVISION STORE DEPARTMENT          00002800
//* DELSUM  - DELETE THE SONSUM VSAM FILE                               00002900
//* DEFSUM  - DEFINE THE SONSUM VSAM FILE                               00003000
//* REPSUM  - REPRO THE SONSUM VSAM FILE                                00003100
//* SON3010 - RUN PROGRAM SON3010 TO PRODUCE STORE CHARGE REPORTS       00003200
//*             BY STORE - PRELIMINARY                                  00003300
//* SON3015 - RUN PROGRAM SON3010 TO PRODUCE STORE CHARGE REPORTS       00003400
//*             BY STORE - FINAL                                        00003500
//* SONZONE - ADD ZONE NUMBER TO VALID 75 RECORDS                       00003600

//* SORTMST1- SORT MASTER FILE BY ZONE NUMBER                           00003900

//* DELETE  - DELETE ALL THE DATASETS USED IN THIS PROC                 00002400

//* SONSHINE- CREATE INPUT RECORDS FOR EVERY STORE/DEPT COMBINATION     00003200

//SON0950F PROC
//*********************************************************************
//*   THIS PROC DOES A FULL IMAGE COPY FOR THE SONSDGPR TABLE-       **
//*   TABLE SPACE SON001TS / SONSDINC TABLE-TABLE SPACE SON002TS AND **
//*   SONSECUR TABLE-TABLE SPACE SON003TS                            **
//*                                                                  **
//*              STEP DESCRIPTIONS                                   **
//*              --------------------------------------------------  **
//*   STEP0010 - STOP DB, START RO                                   **
//*   STEP0020 - IMAGE COPY SON001TS/SON002TS/SON003TS               **
//*   STEP0030 - TERMINATES DB2 IMAGE COPY UTILITY ON COPY FAILURE   **
//*   STEP0040 - START DB RW                                         **
//*                                                                  **
//*              PROC CHANGES                                        **
//*              --------------------------------------------------  **
//*   10/01/07   ANN   CHANGED THE VOL PARM AS VOL=(,RETAIN,,25) FOR ** 00180000
//*                    SYSCPY01 AND SYSCPY02 AT STEP0020             ** 00180000
//*   06/26/09   ND    MODIFIED TO USE TEMPLATE                      **
//*                                                                  **

//*   STEP0010 - START SONDB READ ONLY                               ** 00000090
//********************************************************************* 00000150

//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSTSPRT DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSTSIN  DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SON0SRO),DISP=SHR

//*********************************************************************
//*   STEP0020 - IMAGE COPY SON001TS/SON002TS/SON003TS               **

//             DISP=SHR

//             DYNAMNBR=20,

//*                                                                   * 00030001
//* CREATED 08/05/04 - BSM                                            * 00030001
//*                                                                   * 00030001
//*********************************************************************
//*
//*********************************************************************
//* STEP0020 - LOAD DB22 SON* TBLS WITH DATA FROM PRODUCTION          * 00030001
//*********************************************************************
//STEP0020 EXEC PGM=DSNUTILB,REGION=4096K,
//         PARM=(DB22,'',''),
//         COND=(0,NE)
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSUT1   DD UNIT=SYSDA,
//            SPACE=(CYL,(1,1),RLSE)
//SORTOUT  DD UNIT=SYSDA,
//            SPACE=(CYL,(1,1),RLSE)
//SYSMAP   DD UNIT=SYSDA,
//            SPACE=(CYL,(1,1),RLSE)
//SYSERR   DD UNIT=SYSDA,
//            SPACE=(CYL,(1,1),RLSE)
//SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=*
//UTPRINT  DD SYSOUT=*
//SORTWK01 DD UNIT=SYSDA,
//            SPACE=(CYL,(10))
//SORTWK02 DD UNIT=SYSDA,
//            SPACE=(CYL,(10))
//SORTWK03 DD UNIT=SYSDA,
//            SPACE=(CYL,(10))
//SORTWK04 DD UNIT=SYSDA,
//            SPACE=(CYL,(10))
//SORTWK05 DD UNIT=SYSDA,
//            SPACE=(CYL,(10))
//SORTWK06 DD UNIT=SYSDA,
//            SPACE=(CYL,(10))
//IN01     DD DUMMY
//SYSIN    DD DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SON2L10),
//            DISP=SHR
//*********************************************************************
//* STEP0090 - TERMINATE DB2 UTILITY IF STEP0020 ABENDS               * 00030001
//*********************************************************************
//STEP0025 EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01,DYNAMNBR=20,COND=ONLY                      00000030
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00000031
//SYSTSPRT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00000060
//SYSTSIN  DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SON2TMLJ),DISP=SHR
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00000060
//*********************************************************************
//*              E N D    O F    P R O C   S O N 2 9 5 6 B            * 00030001
//*********************************************************************
MEMBER NAME  SON2956K
//SON2956K   PROC
//*********************************************************************
//*                                                                     00030001
//* STEP0010 - LOAD ACCP (DB22) SONSDINC WITH EMPTY INPUT DSN        *  00030001
//* STEP0020 - TERMINATE DB2 UTILITY IF STEP0010 ABENDS               * 00030001
//*                                                                   * 00030001
//* CREATED 08/05/04 - BSM                                            * 00030001
//*                                                                   * 00030001
//*********************************************************************
//*
//*********************************************************************
//* STEP0020 - LOAD DB22 SON* TBLS WITH DATA FROM PRODUCTION          * 00030001
//*********************************************************************
//STEP0020 EXEC PGM=DSNUTILB,REGION=4096K,
//         PARM=(DB22,'',''),
//         COND=(0,NE)
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSUT1   DD UNIT=SYSDA,
//            SPACE=(CYL,(1,1),RLSE)
//SORTOUT  DD UNIT=SYSDA,
//            SPACE=(CYL,(1,1),RLSE)
//SYSMAP   DD UNIT=SYSDA,
//            SPACE=(CYL,(1,1),RLSE)
//SYSERR   DD UNIT=SYSDA,
//            SPACE=(CYL,(1,1),RLSE)
//SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=*
//UTPRINT  DD SYSOUT=*
//SORTWK01 DD UNIT=SYSDA,
//            SPACE=(CYL,(10))
//SORTWK02 DD UNIT=SYSDA,
//            SPACE=(CYL,(10))
//SORTWK03 DD UNIT=SYSDA,
//            SPACE=(CYL,(10))
//SORTWK04 DD UNIT=SYSDA,
//            SPACE=(CYL,(10))
//SORTWK05 DD UNIT=SYSDA,
//            SPACE=(CYL,(10))
//SORTWK06 DD UNIT=SYSDA,
//            SPACE=(CYL,(10))
//IN01     DD DUMMY
//SYSIN    DD DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SON2L02B),
//            DISP=SHR
//*********************************************************************
//* STEP0090 - TERMINATE DB2 UTILITY IF STEP0020 ABENDS               * 00030001
//*********************************************************************
//STEP0025 EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01,DYNAMNBR=20,COND=ONLY                      00000030
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00000031
//SYSTSPRT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00000060
//SYSTSIN  DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SON2TMLK),DISP=SHR
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00000060
//*********************************************************************
