//*********************************************************************
MEMBER NAME  SON5000
//SON5000  PROC
//*-----------------------------------------------------------------*** 00020021
//* STEP0010 - FILE MAINTENANCE,VND DATASET IS CREATED FOR SON5010 JOB  00030021
//*-----------------------------------------------------------------*** 00040021
//STEP0010  EXEC PGM=IEFBR14                                            00060021
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00070021
//DD1      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.PDETAIL.SONADJ01.INPUT,                   00100022
//             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(CYL,(1,1),RLSE),                       00100023
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE,DELETE)                                 00100024
//DD2      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.PDETAIL.SONADJ01.INPUT(+1),               00115022
//             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(CYL,(1,1),RLSE),                       00115023
//             DISP=(,CATLG,DELETE),                                    00115024
//             DCB=(GDG.MODEL,RECFM=FB,LRECL=200,BLKSIZE=27800)         00115025
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00100000
//* STEP0020 - PULL SLS FILE FROM FTP SERVER                            00110000
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00120000
//STEP0020 EXEC PGM=DMBATCH,PARM=(YYSLYNN)                              00130000
//STEPLIB   DD DSN=SYS1.CD.LINKLIB,DISP=SHR                             00140000
//DMMSGFIL  DD DSN=D955.NDM.MSG,DISP=SHR                                00150000
//DMNETMAP  DD DSN=D955.NDM51.NETMAP,DISP=SHR                           00160000
//DMPUBLIB  DD DSN=D966.KACSQ.PROCESS.LIB,DISP=SHR                      00170000
//NDMCMDS   DD SYSOUT=*                                                 00180000
//DMPRINT   DD SYSOUT=*                                                 00190000
//SYSPRINT  DD SYSOUT=*                                                 00200000
//SYSIN     DD DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SON5000A),DISP=SHR                00220000
//*                                                                     00230000
//*--------------------------------------------------------------------*
//* STEP0030 - NOTIFY GROUP IF FTP TRANSFER IS NOT SUCCESSFUL
//*--------------------------------------------------------------------*
//STEP0030 EXEC PGM=IEBGENER,COND=(0,EQ,STEP0020)
//SYSIN    DD DUMMY
//SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=*
//SYSUT2   DD SYSOUT=(B,SMTP)
//SYSUT1   DD DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SON5000B),DISP=SHR
//*
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00240000
//* SON5000 - END OF PROCEDURE                                          00250000
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00260000
MEMBER NAME  SON5010A
//SON5010A  PROC GEN='(+1)'
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00007310
//*  STEP0010 - DELETE DATASETS FROM LAST EXECUTION                  ***00007311
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00007312
//STEP0010 EXEC PGM=IEFBR14                                             00007313
//DD1      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ01.INPUT,                           00007314
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00007315
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),                                       00007316
//             SPACE=(TRK,1)                                            00007317
//DD2      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ03.INPUT,                           00007322
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00007323
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),                                       00007324
//             SPACE=(TRK,1)                                            00007325
//DD3      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ04.INPUT,                           00007322
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00007323
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),                                       00007324
//             SPACE=(TRK,1)                                            00007325
//DD4      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ05.INPUT,                           00007322
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00007323
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),                                       00007324
//             SPACE=(TRK,1)                                            00007325
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***
//*  STEP0020 - REFORMATS THE INPUT FUEL REWARDS FILE                ***
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***
//STEP0020 EXEC PGM=SORT
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*
//SORTIN   DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.BAKALL.SONADJ01.INPUT&GEN,
//             DISP=SHR
//SORTOUT  DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ01.INPUT,
//             SPACE=(CYL,(100,20),RLSE),
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=35)
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SONSLS01),DISP=SHR
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***
//*  STEP0030 - TAKE SEQUENTIAL BACKUP OF DEPT 06 SALES PERC FILE    ***
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***
//STEP0030 EXEC PGM=IDCAMS
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*
//IN       DD  DSN=D966.FINVK.SALES.ADJUST,DISP=OLD
//OUT      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ02.INPUT&GEN,
//             SPACE=(CYL,(2,5),RLSE),
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             DCB=(GDG.MODEL,DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=18)
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(INOUT),DISP=SHR
//*---------------------------------------------------------------***
//*  STEP0040 - SPLITS THE DEPT 06 SALES FROM OTHER DEPT SALES    ***
//*---------------------------------------------------------------***
//STEP0040 EXEC PGM=SORT
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*
//SORTIN   DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV011.SON30LL(0),DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV014.SON30LL(0),DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV016.SON30LL(0),DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV018.SON30LL(0),DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV021.SON30LL(0),DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV024.SON30LL(0),DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV025.SON30LL(0),DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV026.SON30LL(0),DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV029.SON30LL(0),DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV034.SON30LL(0),DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV035.SON30LL(0),DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV090.SON30LL(0),DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV533.SON30LL(0),DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV615.SON30LL(0),DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV620.SON30LL(0),DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV660.SON30LL(0),DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV701.SON30LL(0),DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV703.SON30LL(0),DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV704.SON30LL(0),DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV705.SON30LL(0),DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV706.SON30LL(0),DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV708.SON30LL(0),DISP=SHR
//SORTOF01 DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ03.INPUT,
//             SPACE=(CYL,(100,20),RLSE),
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=26)
//SORTOF02 DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ04.INPUT,
//             SPACE=(CYL,(100,20),RLSE),
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=26)
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SONSLS02),DISP=SHR
//*---------------------------------------------------------------***

//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*
//SORTIN   DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ03.INPUT,

//SORTOUT  DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ05.INPUT,

//*---------------------------------------------------------------***
MEMBER NAME  SON5010B
//SON5010B  PROC
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00007310
//*  STEP0010 - DELETE DATASETS FROM LAST EXECUTION                  ***00007311

//STEP0010 EXEC PGM=IEFBR14                                             00007313

//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00007323
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),                                       00007324

//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*

//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=26)
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SONSLS04),DISP=SHR

//*  STEP0030 - 100 % ALLOCATION TO PHARMACY ONLY STORES          ***
//*---------------------------------------------------------------***
//STEP0030 EXEC PGM=SORT
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*
//SORTJNF1 DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ01.INPUT,
//             DISP=SHR
//SORTJNF2 DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ06.INPUT,

MEMBER NAME  SON5010C
//SON5010C  PROC GEN='(+1)'
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00007310
//*  STEP0010 - DELETE DATASETS FROM LAST EXECUTION                  ***00007311

//             SPACE=(TRK,1)                                            00007325
//*---------------------------------------------------------------***
//*  STEP0020 - ALLOCATION OF FIXED RX % TO ALL THE ALL THE ST-DT ***
//*---------------------------------------------------------------***
//STEP0020 EXEC PGM=SORT
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*
//SORTJNF1 DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ02.INPUT&GEN,
//             DISP=SHR
//SORTJNF2 DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ07.INPUT,
//             DISP=SHR

//             SPACE=(CYL,(100,20),RLSE),
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=24)
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SONSLS06),DISP=SHR
//*---------------------------------------------------------------***
//*  STEP0030 - MAP THE AMOUNTS IN FUEL REWARDS FILE TO RX FILE   ***
//*---------------------------------------------------------------***
//STEP0030 EXEC PGM=SORT
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*
//SORTJNF1 DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ09.INPUT,
//             DISP=SHR
//SORTJNF2 DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ10.INPUT,
//             DISP=SHR
//SORTOUT  DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ11.INPUT,
//             SPACE=(CYL,(100,20),RLSE),
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=67)
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SONSLS07),DISP=SHR
//*---------------------------------------------------------------***
//*  STEP0040 - RX FIXED % ALLOCATION & AMOUNT LEFT FOR OTHER DEPT***
//*---------------------------------------------------------------***
//STEP0040 EXEC PGM=SORT
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*
//SORTIN   DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ11.INPUT,DISP=SHR
//SORTOF01 DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ12.INPUT,
//             SPACE=(CYL,(100,20),RLSE),

//SORTOF02 DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ13.INPUT,
//             SPACE=(CYL,(100,20),RLSE),
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=38)

//*---------------------------------------------------------------***
MEMBER NAME  SON5010D
//SON5010D PROC
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00007310
//*  STEP0010 - DELETE DATASETS FROM LAST EXECUTION                  ***00007311
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00007312
//STEP0010 EXEC PGM=IEFBR14                                             00007313
//DD1      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ14.INPUT,                           00007314
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00007315
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),                                       00007316
//             SPACE=(TRK,1)                                            00007317
//DD2      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ15.INPUT,                           00007322
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00007323
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),                                       00007324
//             SPACE=(TRK,1)                                            00007325
//DD3      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ16.INPUT,                           00007322
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00007323
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),                                       00007324
//             SPACE=(TRK,1)                                            00007325
//DD4      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ17.INPUT,                           00007322
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00007323
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),                                       00007324
//             SPACE=(TRK,1)                                            00007325
//*---------------------------------------------------------------***
//*  STEP0020 - CALCULATION OF ALLOCATION % FOR EVERY STORE-DEPT  ***
//*---------------------------------------------------------------***
//STEP0020 EXEC PGM=SORT
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*
//SORTJNF1 DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ03.INPUT,
//             DISP=SHR
//SORTJNF2 DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ05.INPUT,
//             DISP=SHR
//SORTOUT  DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ14.INPUT,
//             SPACE=(CYL,(100,20),RLSE),
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=58)
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SONSLS09),DISP=SHR
//*---------------------------------------------------------------***
//*  STEP0030 - ALLOC AMT TO VALID STORE & FIND THE INVALID STORE ***
//*---------------------------------------------------------------***
//STEP0030 EXEC PGM=SORT
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*
//SORTJNF1 DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ14.INPUT,
//             DISP=SHR
//SORTJNF2 DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ12.INPUT,
//             DISP=SHR
//SORTOF01 DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ15.INPUT,
//             SPACE=(CYL,(100,20),RLSE),
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=38)
//SORTOF02 DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ16.INPUT,
//             SPACE=(CYL,(100,20),RLSE),
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=35)
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SONSLS10),DISP=SHR
//*---------------------------------------------------------------***
//*  STEP0040 - CREATE 73 CARD OF EVERY INPUT RECORDS             ***
//*---------------------------------------------------------------***
//STEP0040 EXEC PGM=SORT
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*
//SORTIN   DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ13.INPUT,DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ15.INPUT,DISP=SHR
//SORTOUT  DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ17.INPUT,
//             SPACE=(CYL,(100,20),RLSE),
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=200)
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SONSLS11),DISP=SHR
//*---------------------------------------------------------------***
MEMBER NAME  SON5010E
//SON5010E PROC
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00007310
//*  STEP0010 - DELETE DATASETS FROM LAST EXECUTION                  ***00007311
//*------------------------------------------------------------------***00007312
//STEP0010 EXEC PGM=IEFBR14                                             00007313
//DD1      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ18.INPUT,                           00007314
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00007315
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),                                       00007316
//             SPACE=(TRK,1)                                            00007317
//DD2      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ19.INPUT,                           00007322
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00007323
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),                                       00007324
//             SPACE=(TRK,1)                                            00007325
//DD3      DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ20.INPUT,                           00007322
//             UNIT=SYSDA,                                              00007323
//             DISP=(MOD,DELETE),                                       00007324
//             SPACE=(TRK,1)                                            00007325
//*---------------------------------------------------------------***
//*  STEP0020 - SORT SUM THE ALLOCATED AMOUNTS ON DEST SIDE       ***
//*---------------------------------------------------------------***
//STEP0020 EXEC PGM=SORT
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*
//SORTIN   DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ17.INPUT,DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ08.INPUT,DISP=SHR
//SORTOUT  DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ18.INPUT,
//             SPACE=(CYL,(100,20),RLSE),
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=30)
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SONSLS12),DISP=SHR
//*---------------------------------------------------------------***
//*  STEP0030 - COMPARE DEST SIDE AMOUNT TO SOURCE SIDE AMOUNTS   ***
//*---------------------------------------------------------------***
//STEP0030 EXEC PGM=SORT
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*
//SORTJNF1 DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ01.INPUT,
//             DISP=SHR
//SORTJNF2 DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ18.INPUT,
//             DISP=SHR
//SORTOUT  DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ19.INPUT,
//             SPACE=(CYL,(100,20),RLSE),
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=38)
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SONSLS13),DISP=SHR
//*---------------------------------------------------------------***
//*  STEP0040 - CREATE THE 73 CARDS FOR AMOUNTS LOST TO ROUNDOFF  ***
//*---------------------------------------------------------------***
//STEP0040 EXEC PGM=SORT
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*
//SORTIN   DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ19.INPUT,DISP=SHR
//SORTOUT  DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ20.INPUT,
//             SPACE=(CYL,(100,20),RLSE),
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=200)
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SONSLS11),DISP=SHR
MEMBER NAME  SON5010F
//SON5010F PROC
//*-----------------------------------------------------------------***
//* STEP0010 - DELETE DATASETS CREATED DURING PREVIOUS EXECUTION    ***
//*-----------------------------------------------------------------***
//STEP0010 EXEC PGM=IEFBR14
//DD1    DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.PDETAIL.SONADJ01.REVERSAL,
//           UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),
//           DISP=(MOD,DELETE,DELETE)
//DD2    DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.PDETAIL.SONADJ01.REVPACK,
//           UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),
//           DISP=(MOD,DELETE,DELETE)
//DD3    DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.PDETAIL.SONADJ01.PACKED,
//           UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),
//           DISP=(MOD,DELETE,DELETE)
//DD4    DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.PDETAIL.SONADJ01.COMBINED,
//           UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1),RLSE),
//           DISP=(MOD,DELETE,DELETE)
//*-----------------------------------------------------------------***
//* STEP0020 -  SON REVERSAL OF ANY PREVIOUS GDG'S                    *
//*-----------------------------------------------------------------***
//STEP0020 EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01,DYNAMNBR=35
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=D55.TEMP.LOAD,DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D55.PANEXEC.LOAD,DISP=SHR
//ABNLOG   DD  DSN=D999.CFMVK.PMASTER.ABND,DISP=SHR
//SYSABEND DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*
//SONINPUT DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.PDETAIL.SONADJ01.INPUT,DISP=SHR
//SONOUTPT DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.PDETAIL.SONADJ01.REVERSAL,
//             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(45,15),RLSE),
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),
//             DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=200,BLKSIZE=0)
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSTSPRT DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSTSIN  DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(ESC5050),DISP=SHR
//*-----------------------------------------------------------------***
//* STEP0030 -  SON REVERSAL CONVERSION TO PACKED DECIMAL           ***
//*-----------------------------------------------------------------***
//STEP0030 EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01,DYNAMNBR=35
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=D55.TEMP.LOAD,DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D55.PANEXEC.LOAD,DISP=SHR
//ABNLOG   DD  DSN=D999.CFMVK.PMASTER.ABND,DISP=SHR
//SYSABEND DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*
//SONINPUT DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.PDETAIL.SONADJ01.REVERSAL,DISP=SHR
//SONOUTPT DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.PDETAIL.SONADJ01.REVPACK,
//             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(45,15),RLSE),
//             DISP=(,CATLG,DELETE),
//             DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=200,BLKSIZE=0)
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSTSPRT DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSTSIN  DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(ESC5070),DISP=SHR
//*-----------------------------------------------------------------***
//* STEP0040 -  SON ORIGINAL - CONVERSION TO PACKED DECIMAL           *
//*             DON'T RUN STEP IS FILE IS EMPTY FROM STEP0020         *
//*-----------------------------------------------------------------***
//STEP0040 EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01,DYNAMNBR=35
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=D55.TEMP.LOAD,DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D55.PANEXEC.LOAD,DISP=SHR
//ABNLOG   DD  DSN=D999.CFMVK.PMASTER.ABND,DISP=SHR
//SYSABEND DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*
//SONINPUT DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ08.INPUT,DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ17.INPUT,DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.SONADJ20.INPUT,DISP=SHR
//SONOUTPT DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.PDETAIL.SONADJ01.PACKED,
//             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(45,15),RLSE),
//             DISP=(,CATLG,DELETE),
//             DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=200,BLKSIZE=0)
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSTSPRT DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSTSIN  DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(ESC5070),DISP=SHR
//*********************************************************************
//* STEP0050 -  SORT/SUM ORIGINAL SONEXTRC AND REVERSAL FILE          *
//*             DON'T RUN STEP IS FILE IS EMPTY FROM STEP0020         *
//*********************************************************************
//STEP0050  EXEC PGM=SORT
//SORTLIB  DD  DSN=SYS1.SORTLIB,DISP=SHR
//SORTIN   DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.PDETAIL.SONADJ01.PACKED,DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.PDETAIL.SONADJ01.REVPACK,DISP=SHR
//SORTOUT  DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.PDETAIL.SONADJ01.COMBINED,
//             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(25,15),RLSE),
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),
//             DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=200,BLKSIZE=0)
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(ESC5010S),DISP=SHR
//********************************************************************
//*   STEP0060 - REFORMAT AMOUNT FIELDS AND ONLY WRITE NON-ZERO
//*              AMOUNT FIELD RECORDS.
//*              DON'T RUN STEP IS FILE IS EMPTY FROM STEP0020
//********************************************************************
//STEP0060 EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01,DYNAMNBR=35
//CEEDUMP  DD  SYSOUT=*
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=D55.TEMP.LOAD,DISP=SHR
//         DD  DSN=D55.PANEXEC.LOAD,DISP=SHR
//ABNLOG   DD  DSN=D999.CFMVK.PMASTER.ABND,DISP=SHR
//SYSABEND DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*
//SONINPUT DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.PDETAIL.SONADJ01.COMBINED,DISP=SHR
//SONOUTPT DD  DSN=D966.SONSQ.PDETAIL.SONADJ01.INPUT(+1),
//             UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(45,15),RLSE),
//             DISP=(,CATLG,DELETE),
//             DCB=(GDG.MODEL,RECFM=FB,LRECL=200,BLKSIZE=0)
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSTSPRT DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSTSIN  DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(ESC5090),DISP=SHR
//********************************************************************
//*   STEP0070 - COPY TO THE GDG FOR THE SON SYSTEM IF DATA EXISTS
//********************************************************************
//STEP0070 EXEC PGM=SORT
//SORTLIB  DD DSN=SYS1.SORTLIB,DISP=SHR
//SORTIN   DD DSN=D966.SONSQ.PDETAIL.SONADJ01.INPUT(+1),
//            DISP=SHR
//SORTOUT  DD DSN=D966.SONSQ.DIV060.CROSSDIV(+1),
//            UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(45,15),RLSE),
//            DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),
//            DCB=(GDG.MODEL,RECFM=FB,LRECL=200,BLKSIZE=0)
//SYSOUT   DD SYSOUT=*
//SYSIN    DD DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SORTCOPY),DISP=SHR
//********************************************************************
//*   STEP0080 - COPY TO THE GDG FOR THE SON SYSTEM IF DATA EXISTS
//********************************************************************
//STEP0080 EXEC PGM=SORT
//SORTLIB  DD DSN=SYS1.SORTLIB,DISP=SHR
//SORTIN   DD DSN=D966.SONSQ.PDETAIL.SONADJ01.INPUT(+1),
//            DISP=SHR
//SORTOUT  DD DSN=D966.SONSQ.BDETAIL.SONADJ01.INPUT(+1),
//            UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(45,15),RLSE),
//            DISP=(,CATLG,DELETE),
//            DCB=(GDG.MODEL,RECFM=FB,LRECL=200,BLKSIZE=0)
//SYSOUT   DD SYSOUT=*
//SYSIN    DD DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SORTCOPY),DISP=SHR
//********************************************************************
